The definition of the Mirror image polydactyly is that A hand or foot with more than five digits that has a recognizable A/P axis of symmetry. The axis can lie within a normally formed or partially duplicated digit resembling a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe, or hallux. Alternatively, the axis can be in an interdigital space with a flanking pair of digits that resemble a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe or hallux. The most lateral digits on each side of the hand/foot typically resemble fifth fingers/toes.
The definition of the Mirror image hand polydactyly is that Mirror image duplication of digits affecting the hands only.
The definition of the Mirror image foot polydactyly is that Mirror image duplication of digits affecting the feet.
The definition of the 2-5 finger syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of fingers two to five.

The definition of the Pulverulent Cataract is that A kind of congenital cataract that is characterized by a hollow sphere of punctate opacities involving the fetal nucleus and that usually occurs bilaterally. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:vkumar, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]
The definition of the Lamellar pulverulent cataract is that A Lamellar cataract with a pulverulent (punctate, dust-like" opacities) appearance."
The definition of the Sutural cataract is that A type of congenital cataract in which the opacity follows the anterior or posterior Y suture.
The definition of the Polar cataract is that A type of Congenital cataract in which the opacities occupy the subcapsular cortex at the anterior or posterior pole of the lens.
The definition of the Anterior pyramidal cataract is that A type of anterior polar cataract which projects as a conical opacity into the anterior chamber.
The definition of the Nuclear pulverulent cataract is that A type of nuclear cataract involving congenital dust-like (pulverulent) opacity of the embryonal and fetal nucleus.
The definition of the Abnormal immunoglobulin level is that An abnormal deviation from normal levels of immunoglobulins in blood.
The definition of the Hypergammaglobulinemia is that An increased level of gamma globulin (immunoglobulin) in the blood.
The definition of the 1-2 finger syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of fingers one and two.
The definition of the 4-5 finger syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of fingers four and five.
The definition of the 1-3 finger syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of fingers one to three.
The definition of the 1-4 finger syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of fingers one to four.
The definition of the 1-5 finger syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of fingers one to five (complete syndactyly of all fingers of the hand).
The definition of the 2-4 finger syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of the fingers two to four.
The definition of the 3-5 finger syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of fingers three to five.
The definition of the 1-2 toe syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of toes one and two.
The definition of the 1-4 toe syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of toes one to four.
The definition of the 1-5 toe syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of toes one to five (complete syndactyly of all toes of the foot).
The definition of the 2-4 toe syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of toes two to four.
The definition of the 2-5 toe syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of toes two to five.
The definition of the 3-5 toe syndactyly is that Syndactyly with fusion of toes three to five.

The definition of the Osseous syndactyly of toes is that Webbing or fusion of the toes, involving soft parts and including fusion of individual bones of the toes. Bony fusions are referred to as bony" Syndactyly if the fusion occurs in a tibial-fibular axis. Fusions of bones of the toes in a proximo-distal axis are referred to as "Symphalangism"."
The definition of the Abnormality of hair texture is that An abnormality of the texture of the hair.
The definition of the Abnormal hair pattern is that An abnormality of the distribution of hair growth.
The definition of the Abnormal hair whorl is that An abnormal hair whorl (that is, a patch of hair growing in the opposite direction of the rest of the hair).
The definition of the Asymmetry of the ears is that An asymmetriy, i.e., difference in size, shape or position between the left and right ear.

The definition of the Advanced pneumatization of the mastoid process is that An abnormally advanced degree of pneumatization (i.e., formation of air cells) in the mastoid process with respect to age-dependent norms.
The definition of the Prominent corneal nerve fibers is that Abnormal prominence of the corneal nerve fibers. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:DDD_ncarter, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]
The definition of the Spontaneous rupture of the globe is that Rupture of the eyeball not due to trauma.
The definition of the aplasia of the retina is that A developmental defect characterized by absence of the retina.

The definition of the Cherry red spot of the macula is that Pallor of the perifoveal macula of the retina with appearance of a small circular reddish choroid shape as seen through the fovea centralis due to relative transparancy of the macula.
The definition of the Double eyebrow is that This may present as a partial or complete duplication of the eyebrows.
The definition of the Extension of eyebrows towards upper eyelid is that The eyebrows extend towards - or even all the way down to - the margin of the upper eyelid.

The definition of the Nodular changes affecting the eyelids is that Nodular changes affecting the eyelids may have many different causes such as cystic lesions (chalaziae, hordeolae), lipogranulomas, melanomas, infectious diseases (Molluscum contagiosum) and many more.
The definition of the Naevus flammeus of the eyelid is that Naevus flammeus localised in the skin of the eyelid.

The definition of the Fibrous dysplasia of the bones is that Tumor-like growths that consist of replacement of the medullary bone with fibrous tissue, causing the expansion and weakening of the areas of bone involved. Especially when involving the skull or facial bones, the lesions can cause externally visible deformities. The skull is often, but not necessarily, affected, and any other bone or bones may be involved. Fibrous dysplasia can either effect isolated bones (Monostotic fibrous dysplasia) or also generalized all bones of the body (Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia).

The definition of the Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia is that Fibrous dysplasia of the bones were lesions are localized in many bones throughout of the body. Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia is a cardinal feature of McCune-Albright syndrome.
The definition of the Monostotic fibrous dysplasia is that Fibrous dysplasia of the bones were lesions are localized in only one bone.

The definition of the Osteopoikilosis is that Osteopoikilosis is a benign, asymptomatic sclerotic dysplasia of the bones. It affects both male and female and may be seen at any age. Radiographically sclerotic circular or ovoid lesions are usually symmetrically distributed in a periarticular location. Lesions can increase or decrease in size and number in serial radiographs or even disappear and do not have increased bone radiotracer uptake.

The definition of the Osteopathia striata is that A lamellar pattern visible on radiographs and mainly localized at the metaphyses of the long tubular bones. Pathologic-anatomical studies revealed that these benign signs on x-rays are the result of a juvenile metaphyseal bone necrosis. Calcifications in the necrotic marrow lead to this lamellar or lattice-like appearance.
The definition of the Edema of the lower limbs is that An abnormal accumulation of excess fluid in the lower extremity resulting in swelling of the feet and extending upward to the lower leg.
The definition of the Edema of the upper limbs is that An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin of the arms.
The definition of the Short metatarsal is that Diminished length of a metatarsal bone, with resultant proximal displacement of the associated toe.
The definition of the Absent metatarsal bone is that A developmental abnormality characterized by the absence (aplasia) of a metatarsal bone.
The definition of the aplasia of the phalanges of the toes is that Absence of a digit or of one or more phalanges of a toe.
The definition of the Medial flaring of the eyebrow is that An abnormal distribution of eyebrow hair growth in the medial direction.
The definition of the Ectopic lacrimal punctum is that Positioning of a lacrimal punctum other than at the medial margins of the eyelid. [PMID:19125427]

The definition of the Blepharochalasis is that Blepharochalasis is characterized by recurrent, non-painful, nonerythematous episodes of eyelid edema. It has been divided into hypertrophic and atrophic forms. In the hypertrophic form recurrent edema results in orbital fat herniation through a weakened orbital septum. Most patients who have blepharochalasis present in an atrophic condition with atrophy of redundant eyelid skin and superior nasal fat pads. [PMID:3207663]
The definition of the Dermatochalasis is that Loss of elasticity of the upper and lower eyelids causing the skin to sag and bulge.
The definition of the Chin dimple is that A persistent midline depression of the skin over the fat pad of the chin. [PMID:19125436]
The definition of the Cleft mandible is that Midline deficiency of the mandible and some or all overlying tissues. [PMID:19125436]
The definition of the Abnormality of the temporomandibular joint is that An anomaly of the temporomandibular joint.
The definition of the Asymmetry of the maxilla is that Asymmetry between the left and right sides of the maxilla.
The definition of the aplasia/Hypoplasia of the premaxilla is that Absence or underdevelopment of the premaxilla.
The definition of the aplasia of the premaxilla is that Absence of the premaxilla, which is the embryonic structure that forms the anterior part of the maxilla.

The definition of the Abnormality of the premaxilla is that An abnormality of the premaxilla, the most anterior part of the maxilla that usually bears the central and lateral incisors and includes the anterior nasal spine and inferior aspect of the piriform rim. The premaxilla contains the bone and teeth of the primary palate.

The definition of the Premaxillary Prominence is that Prominent positioning of the premaxilla in relation to the rest of the maxilla, the facial skeleton, or mandible. Not necessarily caused by an increase in size (hypertrophy of) the premaxilla.
The definition of the Absent toe is that Aplasia of a toe. That is, absence of all phalanges of a non-hallux digit of the foot and the associated soft tissues.
The definition of the Broad columella is that Increased width of the columella. [PMID:19152422]

The definition of the Chordoma is that A chordoma is a tumor that arises from embryonic remnants of the notochord along the length of the neuraxis. Chordomas generally occur in the sacrum, intracranially at the clivus, or along the spinal axis.
The definition of the Low insertion of columella is that Insertion of the posterior columella below the nasal base. [PMID:19152422]
The definition of the Short eyelashes is that Decreased length of the eyelashes (subjective).
The definition of the Palmar hyperkeratosis is that Abnormal thickening of the skin localized to the palm of the hand.
The definition of the Ectopic calcification is that Deposition of calcium salts in a tissue or location in which calcification does not normally occur.

The definition of the Sacrococcygeal pilonidal abnormality is that The presence of a cyst, fistula, or abscess in the sacrococcygeal region (gluteal crease) characteristically accompanied by hair and skin folds.
The definition of the Pilonidal sinus is that A sinus in the coccygeal region (the region of the intergluteal cleft). A pilonidal sinus often contains hair and skin debris.
The definition of the Pilonidal abscess is that A hair-containing cyst or sinus usually in the coccygeal region.
The definition of the Anomalous pulmonary venous return is that Right pulmonary venous return to the inferior vena cava. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:DDD_dbrown, PMID:16638549]

The definition of the Partial anomalous pulmonary venous return is that A form of anomalous pulmonary venous return in which not all pulmonary veins drain abnormally. Partial anomalous pulmonary venous return frequently involves one or both of the veins from one lung.

The definition of the Cor triatriatrum is that The presence of an additional membrane in the left or right cardiac atrium which results in the subdivision of the affected atrium (and thus in total three atria, whence the name). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:DDD_dbrown, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]

The definition of the Vascular ring is that A developmental defect of the aortic arch system in which the trachea and esophagus are completely encircled by connected segments of the aortic arch and its branches. This occurs if the normal process of regression and persistence of the bilateral embryonic aortic arches fails.
The definition of the Tracheobronchmegaly is that Marked widening of the trachea and major bronchi that may be predispose to chronic respiratory tract infection.
The definition of the Bronchomegaly is that Marked widening of the major bronchi that may be predispose to chronic respiratory tract infection.
The definition of the Tracheomegaly is that Marked widening of the trachea.
The definition of the Large pelvis is that The presence of an abnormally large pelvis.
The definition of the Hyperacusis is that Over-sensitivity to certain frequency ranges of sound. [PMID:14645606, PMID:14647932, PMID:31669363]
The definition of the Skin dimples is that Skin dimples are cutaneous indentations that are the result of tethering of the skin to underlying structures (bone) causing an indentation.
The definition of the Shoulder dimples is that A subtype of skin dimples occurring in the shoulder region.
The definition of the Erythema is that Redness of the skin, caused by hyperemia of the capillaries in the lower layers of the skin.
The definition of the Uterine neoplasm is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the uterus.
The definition of the Gonadal neoplasm is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of a gonad.
The definition of the Urinary tract neoplasm is that The presence of a neoplasm of the urinary system.
The definition of the Genital neoplasm is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the genital system.
The definition of the Testicular neoplasm is that The presence of a neoplasm of the testis.
The definition of the Hypoplasia of the Leydig cells is that Underdevelopment of the interstitial (Leydig) cells of the testis. These cells produce testosterone.
The definition of the Hyperplasia of the Leydig cells is that Hypertrophy or overdevelopment of the interstitial (Leydig) cells of the testis. These cells produce testosterone.
The definition of the Bifid nail is that A digit with two nails, with at least some soft tissue between them. [PMID:19125433]

The definition of the Impaired visuospatial constructive cognition is that Reduced ability affecting mainly visuospatial cognition which may be tested using pattern construction (for example by Differential Ability Scales, which test a person's strengths and weaknesses across a range of intellectual abilities).
The definition of the Cerebellar glioma is that A glioma affecting the cerebellum.
The definition of the Brainstem glioma is that A glioma affecting the brainstem.

The definition of the Hemangioblastoma is that A hemangioblastoma is a benign vascular neoplasm that arises almost exclusively in the central nervous system. Hemangioblastomas consist of a tightly packed cluster of small blood vessels forming a mass of up to 1 or 2 cm in diameter.
The definition of the Lip freckle is that Increased focal pigmentation of the vermilion of the lips. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Pinealoma is that A benign or malignant neoplasm that occurs within the intracranial cavity above the tentorium cerebelli. []
The definition of the Absent cupid's bow is that Lack of paramedian peaks and median notch of the upper lip vermilion. [PMID:19125428]

The definition of the Underdeveloped nasolabial fold is that Reduced bulkiness of the crease or fold of skin running from the lateral margin of the nose, where nasal base meets the skin of the face, to a point just lateral to the corner of the mouth (cheilion or commissure). [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Perioral hyperpigmentation is that Increased pigmentation, either focal or generalized, of the skin surrounding the vermilion of the lips. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Everted upper lip vermilion is that Inner aspect of the upper lip vermilion (normally apposing the teeth) visible in a frontal view, i.e., the presence of an everted upper lip.

The definition of the Tented upper lip vermilion is that Triangular appearance of the oral aperture with the apex in the midpoint of the upper vermilion and the lower vermilion forming the base. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Upturned corners of mouth is that Oral commissures positioned superior to the midline labial fissure. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the U-Shaped upper lip vermilion is that Gentle upward curve of the upper lip vermilion such that the center is placed well superior to the commissures. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Open bite is that Visible space between the dental arches in occlusion. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Protruding tongue is that Tongue extending beyond the alveolar ridges or teeth at rest. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Broad uvula is that Increased width of the uvula (subjective finding). [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Long uvula is that Increased length of the uvula. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Narrow uvula is that Decreased width of the uvula. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Short uvula is that Decreased length of the uvula. [PMID:19125428]
The definition of the Abnormal number of hair whorls is that More than two clockwise hair whorls. [PMID:19125436]

The definition of the Abnormal position of hair whorl is that Hair growth from a single point on the scalp in any location other than lateral to the midline and close to the vertex of the skull. [PMID:19125436]

The definition of the Nevus sebaceous is that A congenital, hairless plaque consisting of overgrown epidermis, sebaceous glands, hair follicles, apocrine glands and connective tissue. They are a variant of epidermal naevi. Sebaceous naevi most often appear on the scalp, but they may also arise on the face, neck or forehead. At birth, a sevaceous nevus typically appears as a solitary, smooth, yellow-orange hairless patch. Sebaceous naevi become more pronounced around adolescence, often appearing bumpy, warty or scaly.
The definition of the Epidermal nevus is that Epidermal naevi are due to an overgrowth of the epidermis and may be present at birth (50%) or develop during childhood.
The definition of the Linear nevus sebaceous is that A type of nevus sebaceous with a linear form, raised borders and yellowish color.

The definition of the Generalized tonic seizures is that A generalized tonic seizure is a type of generalized motor seizure characterised by bilateral limb stiffening or elevation, often with neck stiffening without a subsequent clonic phase. The tonic activity can be a sustained abnormal posture, either in extension or flexion, sometimes accompanied by tremor of the extremities. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199, PMID:11580774, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Atonic seizures is that Atonic seizure is a type of motor seizure characterized by a sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone without apparent preceding myoclonic or tonic event lasting about 1 to 2 seconds, involving head, trunk, jaw, or limb musculature. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1735-8178, PMID:11580774]

The definition of the Dacrystic seizures is that Focal emotional seizure with crying (dacrystic) is characterized by the presence of stereotyped crying, this may be accompanied by lacrimation, sad facial expression and sobbing. The subjective emotion of sadness may or may not be present.

The definition of the Gelastic seizures is that Focal emotional seizure with laughing (gelastic) is characterized by bursts of laughter or giggling, usually without appropriate related emotion of happiness, and described as 'mirthless'.

The definition of the Scintillating scotoma is that A scintillating scotoma is a common visual aura that can preced a migraine, whereby a spot of flickering light near the center of the visual fields occurs. The spot prevents vision, and is thus termed scotoma. The scotoma can extend into one or more shimmering arcs of white or colored flashing lights.
The definition of the Ridged cranial sutures is that An overlap of the bony plates of the skull in an infant, with or without early closure.
The definition of the Abnormality of the fifth cranial nerve is that Any structural abnormality of the fifth cranial nerve.
The definition of the Abnormality of the eleventh cranial nerve is that Abnormality of the eleventh cranial nerve.
The definition of the Abnormality of the twelfth cranial nerve is that Abnormality of the twelfth cranial nerve.
The definition of the Abnormality of the seventh cranial nerve is that Abnormality of the seventh cranial nerve sometimes also referred to as the facial nerve.
The definition of the Hemifacial spasm is that Intermittent clonic or tonic contraction of muscles supplied by facial nerve. Muscles are relaxed in between contractions.
The definition of the Impaired temperature sensation is that A reduced ability to discriminate between different temperatures.

The definition of the Impaired tactile sensation is that A reduced sense of touch (tactile sensation). This is usually tested with a wisp of cotton or a fine camel's hair brush, by asking patients to say 'now' each time they feel the stimulus.
The definition of the Impaired proprioception is that A loss or impairment of the sensation of the relative position of parts of the body and joint position.

The definition of the Abnormality of pain sensation is that Pain is an unpleasant sensation that can range from mild, localized discomfort to agony, whereby the physical part of pain results from nerve stimulation and is often accompanied by an emotional component. This term groups abnormalities in pain sensation presumed to result from abnormalities related to the specific nerve fibers that carry the pain impulses to the brain.
The definition of the Spontaneous pain sensation is that Spontaneous pain is a kind of neuropathic pain which occurs without an identifiable trigger.

The definition of the Trophic changes related to pain is that Trophic changes is a term used to describe abnormalities in the area of pain that include primarily wasting away of the skin, tissues, or muscle, thinning of the bones, and changes in how the hair or nails grow, including thickening or thinning of hair or brittle nails.
The definition of the Dissociated sensory loss is that A pattern of sensory loss with selective loss of touch sensation and proprioception without loss of pain and temperature, or vice-versa.
The definition of the Abnormality of copper homeostasis is that An abnormal concentration of copper.
The definition of the Decreased serum ceruloplasmin is that Decreased concentration of ceruloplasmin in the blood.
The definition of the High nonceruloplasmin-bound serum copper is that An increased concentration of non ceruloplasmin bound copper in the blood.
The definition of the Increased urinary copper concentration is that An increased concentration of copper in the urine.

The definition of the Multifocal epileptiform discharges is that An abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG) and being identified at multiple locations (foci).
The definition of the EEG with focal slow activity is that Focal (localized) slow activity reflects focal dysfunction, not diffuse dysfunction (i.e., encephalopathy).
The definition of the EEG with multifocal slow activity is that Multifocal slowing of cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the EEG with generalized slow activity is that Diffuse slowing of cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).
The definition of the EEG with spike-wave complexes (<2.5 Hz) is that The presence of complexes of slow spikes and slow waves (<2.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).
The definition of the EEG with spike-wave complexes (2.5-3.5 Hz) is that The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (2.5-3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).
The definition of the EEG with spike-wave complexes (>3.5 Hz) is that The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (>3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).

The definition of the EEG with spike-wave complexes is that Complexes of spikes (<70 ms) and sharp waves (70-200 ms), which are sharp transient waves that have a strong association with epilepsy, in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

The definition of the EEG with burst suppression is that The burst suppression pattern in electroencephalography refers to a characteristic periodic pattern of low voltage (<10 microvolts) suppressed background and a relatively shorter pattern of higher amplitude slow, sharp, and spiking complexes.
The definition of the EEG with photoparoxysmal response is that EEG abnormalities (epileptiform discharges) evoked by flashing lights or black and white striped patterns.

The definition of the EEG with periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges is that Periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges (PLEDs)are periodic, lateralized, and epileptiform. PLEDs show a relatively constant interval between discharges (0.5 to 3 seconds).

The definition of the EEG with generalized low amplitude activity is that An abnormal generalized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

The definition of the EEG with localized low amplitude activity is that An abnormal localized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).
The definition of the EEG with periodic complexes is that Periodically occurring generalized periodic complexes. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the EEG with periodic abnormalities is that Periodically recurring abnormalities in the EEG.

The definition of the EEG with hyperventilation-induced epileptiform discharges is that Epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).
The definition of the Frank breech presentation is that A kind of breech presentation in which the hips are flexed and the knees are extended.
The definition of the Complete breech presentation is that A kind of breech presentation in which the hips are flexed and the knees are flexed.

The definition of the Incomplete breech presentation is that A kind of breech presentation in which one or both hips are extended and one or both of the fetus' feet are pointing down and entering the birth canal.
The definition of the Delayed fine motor development is that A type of motor delay characterized by a delay in acquiring the ability to control the fingers and hands.
The definition of the Receptive language delay is that A delay in the acquisition of the ability to understand the speech of others.
The definition of the Intellectual disability, severe is that Severe mental retardation is defined as an intelligence quotient (IQ) in the range of 20-34.

The definition of the Oppositional defiant disorder is that An enduring pattern of uncooperative, defiant, and hostile behavior towards authority figures that does not involve major antisocial violations, is not accounted for by the child's developmental stage, and results in significant functional impairment. A certain level of oppositional behavior is common in children and adolescents. []
The definition of the Abdominal wall defect is that An incomplete closure of the abdominal wall.

The definition of the Dyssynergia is that A type of ataxia characterized by the impairment of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed. With dyssynergia, a voluntary movement appears broken down into its component parts.
The definition of the Ocular dyssynergia is that A type of dyssynergia affecting eye movements and characterized by the inability to smoothly follow a visual target across the visual field.
The definition of the Asynergia is that A type of dyssynergy characterized by the lack of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed.

The definition of the Sensory ataxia is that Incoordination of movement caused by a deficit in the sensory nervous system. Sensory ataxia can be distinguished from cerebellar ataxia by asking the patient to close his or her eyes. Persons with cerebellar ataxia show only a minimal worsening of symptoms, whereas persons with sensory ataxia show a marked worsening of symptoms.
The definition of the EKG: T-wave inversion is that An inversion of the T-wave (which is normally positive).
The definition of the Cervical spinal cord atrophy is that Atrophy of the cervical segment of the spinal cord.

The definition of the Tendon xanthomatosis is that The presence of xanthomas (intra-and extra-cellular accumulations of cholesterol) extensor tendons (typically over knuckles, Achilles tendon, knee, and elbows).

The definition of the Chaddock reflex is that A diagnostic reflex elicited by stimulation of the skin over the surface of the lateral malleolus of the foot. The Chaddock refelx is present if there is extension of one or more or all of the toes with or without fanning of them when the external inframalleolar skin is stimulated. The Chaddock sign, similar to the Babinski sign, is taken to be an indication of disease of the spinocortical (pyramidal) tract.
The definition of the Abnormality of circulating protein level is that An abnormal level of a circulating protein in the blood.

The definition of the Unilateral strabismus is that A type of strabismus in which the fixating eye is always the same one, while the other eye is constantly deviated. Monocular strabismus is to be distinguished from alternating strabismus, in which either of the eyes 'squints' at different times.

The definition of the Fetal cystic hygroma is that The presence during the prenatal period of a cystic mass with multiple septa with multiple, asymmetric, thin-walled cysts near the posterior aspect of the neck. Fetal cystic hygroma can be defined as nuchal translucency with or without septations measuring greater than 3.0 mm. Increased NT refers to a measurement above the 95th centile, and the term is used irrespective of whether the collection of fluid is septated or not, and whether it is confined to the neck or envelopes the whole fetus. After 14 weeks, increased NT usually resolves, but in some cases it evolves into nuchal edema or cystic hygromas. [eMedicine:402757, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]

The definition of the Increased nuchal translucency is that Nuchal translucency is the sonographic appearance of subcutaneous accumulation of liquid in the back of the fetal neck in the first trimester of pregnancy (11-14 gestational weeks of pregnancy).
The definition of the Abnormality of the umbilical cord is that An abnormality of the umbilical cord, which is the cord connecting the developing embryo or fetus to the placenta.
The definition of the Pulmonary valve atresia is that A congenital disorder of the pulmonary valve in which the orifice of the valve fails to develop.
The definition of the Aortic valve atresia is that A congenital disorder of the aortic valve in which the orifice of the valve fails to develop.
The definition of the Acromelia is that Shortening of the extremities affecting primarily the distal parts of the limbs (hands and feet) in relation to the other segments of the limbs.
The definition of the Aseptic necrosis is that A disease where there is cellular death (necrosis) of bone components due to interruption of the blood supply.

The definition of the Osteochondrosis dissecans is that A joint disorder caused by blood deprivation in the subchondral bone causing the subchondral bone to die in a process called avascular necrosis. The bone is then reabsorbed by the body, leaving the articular cartilage it supported prone to damage. The result is fragmentation (dissection) of both cartilage and bone, and the free movement of these osteochondral fragments within the joint space, causing pain and further damage.
The definition of the Morbus Koehler is that Morbus Koehler is a Juvenile aseptic necrosis affecting the Os naviculare pedis.
The definition of the Morbus Kienboeck is that Morbus Kienboeck is a Juvenile aseptic necrosis affecting the Os lunatum.
The definition of the Morbus Osgood-Schlatter is that Morbus Osgood-Schlatter is a Juvenile aseptic necrosis affecting the Tuberositas tibiae.

The definition of the Morbus Scheuermann is that A developmental growth retardation of the vertebral end plates that may lead to secondary destruction of the vertebral end plates and protrusion of the nucleus pulposus into the vertebral body (so called Schmorl's nodes as seen on x-rays).
The definition of the Abnormality of branched chain family amino acid metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of a branched chain family amino acid in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of phenylalanine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of phenylalanine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of serine family amino acid metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of a serine family amino acid in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of glycine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of glycine in the blood circulation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Hypersarcosinemia is that An elevated plasma concentration of sarcosine. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Hypersarcosinuria is that An elevated urinary concentration of sarcosine. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of sarcosine metabolism is that An deviation from the normal concentration of sarcosine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of aspartate family amino acid metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of an aspartate family amino acid in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of threonine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of threonine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of methionine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of methionine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of glutamine family amino acid metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of a glutamine family amino acid in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of glutamine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of glutamine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of histidine family amino acid metabolism is that An abnormality of a histidine metabolic process.
The definition of the Hyperhistidinemia is that An increased concentration of histidine in the blood. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of proline metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of proline or a proline metabolite in the blood circulation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of lysine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of lysine in the blood circulation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of arginine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of arginine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Hypervalinemia is that An increased concentration of valine in the blood. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Hyperleucinemia is that An increased concentration of leucine in the blood. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of isoleucine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of isoleucine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Hyperisoleucinemia is that An increased concentration of isoleucine in the blood. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of valine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal circulation of valine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of pyruvate family amino acid metabolism is that An abnormality of a pyruvate family amino acid metabolic process.
The definition of the Abnormality of alanine metabolism is that An abnormality of an alanine metabolic process. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of tyrosine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of tyrosine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of cysteine metabolism is that An abnormality of a cysteine metabolic process.
The definition of the Abnormality of homocysteine metabolism is that An abnormality of a homocysteine metabolic process.

The definition of the Coralliform cataract is that A 'coral-like' pattern of opacity in the lens of the eye. That is, a cataract with an irregular, stellate form. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:vkumar, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]
The definition of the Membranous cataract is that A form of cataract in which the lens substance has shrunk, leaving a collapsed, flattened capsule with little or no cortex or epithelium on the lens.
The definition of the Anterior subcapsular cataract is that A type of cataract affecting the anterior pole of lens immediately adjacent to ('beneath') the lens capsule.
The definition of the Posterior cortical cataract is that A cataract that affects the posterior part of the cortex of the lens.

The definition of the Aculeiform cataract is that A kind of nuclear cataract characterized by fiberglasslike or needlelike crystals projecting in different directions, through or close to the axial region of the lens.
The definition of the Abnormality of divalent inorganic cation homeostasis is that An abnormality of divalent inorganic cation homeostasis.
The definition of the Abnormality of cation homeostasis is that An abnormality of cation homeostasis.
The definition of the Abnormality of monovalent inorganic cation homeostasis is that An abnormality of monovalent inorganic cation homeostasis.
The definition of the Abnormality of sodium homeostasis is that An abnormal concentration of sodium.
The definition of the Abnormality of nucleobase metabolism is that An abnormality of a nucleobase metabolic process.
The definition of the Abnormality of xanthine metabolism is that An increased level of xanthine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Xanthinuria is that An increased concentration of xanthine in the urine. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of the upper urinary tract is that An abnormality of the upper urinary tract.
The definition of the Abnormality of the lower urinary tract is that An abnormality of the lower urinary tract.
The definition of the Abnormality of the nasal skeleton is that An abnormality of the nasal skeleton.
The definition of the Abnormality of the external nose is that An abnormality of the external nose.
The definition of the Abnormality of the nasal bone is that An abnormality of the nasal bone, comprising the left nasal bone and the right nasal bone.
The definition of the aplasia of the nasal bone is that Absence of the nasal bone.

The definition of the Echogenic intracardiac focus is that A finding of a focus of increased echogenicity upon prenatal ultrasound examination of the fetus. The foci may be present in one or both ventricles. Echogenic intracardiac focus (EICF) is defined as a focus of echogenicity comparable to bone, in the region of the papillary muscle in either or both ventricles of the fetal heart.
The definition of the Echogenic fetal bowel is that Echogenic bowel is defined as fetal bowel with homogenous areas of echogenicity that are equal to or greater than that of surrounding bone.
The definition of the Abnormality of the renal pelvis is that An abnormality of the renal pelvis.

The definition of the Fetal pyelectasis is that Mild pyelectasis is defined as a hypoechoic spherical or elliptical space within the renal pelvis that measures at least 5mm and not more than 10 mm. The measurement is taken on a transverse section through the fetal renal pelvis using the maximum anterior-to-posterior measurement.
The definition of the Dilatation of the renal pelvis is that The presence of dilatation of the renal pelvis.
The definition of the Abnormality of ductus venosus blood flow is that A first-trimester prenatal ultrasound finding of abnormal blood flow in the ductus venosus.

The definition of the Abnormality of the fetal cardiovascular system is that A structural abnormality of the fetal circulation system. Terms in this subhierarchy are restricted to findings that can only be observed in the prenatal period. Other HPO terms can also be used to describe fetal phenotypes. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:DDD_dbrown, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]
The definition of the Abnormality of umbilical vein blood flow is that A first-trimester prenatal ultrasound finding of abnormal blood flow in the umbilical vein.
The definition of the Abnormality of the fourth ventricle is that An abnormality of the fourth ventricle.
The definition of the Abnormality of the third ventricle is that An abnormality of the third ventricle.

The definition of the Mild fetal ventriculomegaly is that A kind of ventriculomegaly occurring in the fetal period and usually diagnosed by prenatal ultrasound. Cerebral ventriculomegaly is defined by atrial measurements 10 mm or more. Mild ventriculomegaly (MVM) is defined as measurements between 10 and 15 mm. Measurements are obtained from an axial plane at the level of the thalamic nuclei just below the standard image to measure the BPD (PMID:16100637).

The definition of the Noncommunicating hydrocephalus is that A form of hydrocephalus in which the flow of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) within the cerebral ventricular system or in the outlets of the CSF to the arachnoid space is obstructed. [eMedicine:1135286, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]
The definition of the Hypoplastic right heart is that Underdevelopment of the right-sided structures of the heart.
The definition of the Dilatation of the bladder is that The presence of a dilated urinary bladder.
The definition of the Fetal megacystis is that Fetal megacystis is an abnormally enlarged bladder identified at any gestational age.

The definition of the Congenital posterior urethral valve is that A developmental defect resulting in an obstructing membrane in the posterior male urethra. [eMedicine:1016086, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0736-9199]
The definition of the Bilateral renal agenesis is that A bilateral form of agenesis of the kidney.

The definition of the Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation of the lung is that Congenital pulmonary airway malformation (CPAM) - previously known as congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation (CCAM) - is a relatively rare developmental malformation of the lower respiratory tract. It is a hamartomatous, dysplastic developmental abnormality of the lung characterized by abnormal airway patterning during lung branching morphogenesis and is formed by abnormal branching of the immature bronchioles.

The definition of the Bronchopulmonary sequestration is that The presence of a piece lung tissue which is not attached to the pulmonary blood supply and does not communicate with the other lung tissue (not connected to the standard bronchial airways and not performing a function in respiration).
The definition of the Intralobar sequestration is that A kind of bronchopulmonary sequestration that is incorporated into the normal surrounding lung.
The definition of the Extralobar sequestration is that A kind of bronchopulmonary sequestration that is completely discrete from the normal lung and is surrounded by separate pleura.

The definition of the Absence of stomach bubble on fetal sonography is that By the 14th week of gestation it is nearly always possible to visualized the fluid-filled fetal stomach bubble on prenatal sonography. This term refers to the absence of a normal fetal stomach bubble on fetal ultrasonography performed at around 16 to 20 weeks' gestation.
The definition of the Abnormality of long-chain fatty-acid metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of a long-chain fatty acid in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of phytanic acid metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of phytanic acid in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of fatty-acid anion metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of a fatty acid anion in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of carnitine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of carnitine in the blood circulation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]
The definition of the Abnormality of liposaccharide metabolism is that An abnormality of liposaccharide metabolism.
The definition of the Abnormality of glycolipid metabolism is that An abnormality of glycolipid metabolism.
The definition of the Blood group antigen abnormality is that An abnormality of an erythrocyte cell surface molecule.
The definition of the Absence of Lutheran antigen on erythrocytes is that Absence of the Lutheran antigen (a type I integral membrane glycoprotein) from the surface of red blood cells.
The definition of the Anemia of inadequate production is that A kind of anemia characterized by inadequate production of erythrocytes.
The definition of the Abnormality of myeloid leukocytes is that An abnormality of myeloid leukocytes.

The definition of the Abnormality of B cell number is that A deviation from the normal count of B cells, i.e., the cells that are formed in the bone marrow, migrate to the peripheral lymphatic system, and mature into plasma cells or memory cells.
The definition of the B lymphocytopenia is that An abnormal decrease from the normal count of B cells.

The definition of the Abnormality of phagocytes is that An abnormal functioning of phagocytosis. Phagocytosis is an elegant but complex process for the ingestion and elimination of pathogens, but it is also important for the elimination of apoptotic cells and hence fundamental for tissue homeostasis. Phagocytosis can be divided into four main steps: (i) recognition of the target particle, (ii) signaling to activate the internalization machinery, (iii) phagosome formation, and (iv) phagolysosome maturation.
The definition of the Abnormality of immune system physiology is that A functional abnormality of the immune system.
The definition of the Abnormality of the level of lipoprotein cholesterol is that An abnormal increase or decrease in the level of lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood.
The definition of the Hyperlipoproteinemia is that An abnormal increase in the level of lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood.
The definition of the Hypolipoproteinemia is that An abnormal decrease in the level of lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood. []
The definition of the Abnormality of cellular immune system is that An abnormality of the morphology or counts of the cells that make up the immune system.
The definition of the Abnormality of the extrinsic pathway is that An abnormality of the extrinsic pathway (also known as the tissue factor pathway) of the coagulation cascade.
The definition of the Abnormality of the intrinsic pathway is that An abnormality of the intrinsic pathway (also known as the contact activation pathway) of the coagulation cascade.
The definition of the Abnormality of the common coagulation pathway is that An abnormality of blood coagulation, common pathway.
The definition of the Abnormality of the abdominal musculature is that An abnormality of the abdominal musculature.
The definition of the Stress urinary incontinence is that Involuntary urine leakage synchronous with exertion, or actions such as sneezing, or coughing.
The definition of the Abnormality of the cerebral subcortex is that An abnormality of the cerebral subcortex.

The definition of the Abnormality of the striatum is that Abnormality of the striatum, which is the largest nucleus of the basal ganglia, comprising the caudate, putamen and ventral striatum, including the nucleus accumbens.
The definition of the Abnormality of dicarboxylic acid metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of a dicarboxylic acid in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of monocarboxylic acid metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of a monocarboxylic acid in the blood circulation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:gcarletti]

The definition of the Chromosomal breakage induced by ionizing radiation is that Increased amount of chromosomal breaks in cultured blood lymphocytes or other cells induced by treatment with ionizing radiation.

The definition of the Increased susceptibility to spontaneous sister chromatid exchange is that An increase in the number of spontaneous sister chromatid exchanges observed in cell culture of lymphocytes or other cells.

The definition of the Increased bone mineral density is that An abnormal increase of bone mineral density, that is, of the amount of matter per cubic centimeter of bones which is often referred to as osteosclerosis. Osteosclerosis can be detected on radiological examination as an increased whiteness (density) of affected bones.

The definition of the Osteopetrosis is that Abnormally increased formation of dense trabecular bone tissue. Despite the increased density of bone tissue, osteopetrotic bones tend to be more fracture-prone than normal.
The definition of the Severe Myopia is that A severe form of myopia with greater than -6.00 diopters. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:DDD_ncarter]
The definition of the Abnormality of the systemic arterial tree is that An abnormality of the systemic arterial tree, which consists of the aorta and other systemic arteries.
The definition of the Mixed cirrhosis is that A type of cirrhosis characterized by the presence of regenerative nodules of a variety of sizes.
The definition of the Abnormality of the musculature of the neck is that An abnormality of the neck musculature.
The definition of the Abnormality of polysaccharide metabolism is that A deviation from the normal concentration of a polysaccharide in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of carbohydrate metabolism/homeostasis is that A deviation from the normal concentration of a carbohydrate in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormal glucose homeostasis is that Abnormality of glucose homeostasis.
The definition of the Abnormality of blood glucose concentration is that An abnormality of the concentration of glucose in the blood.
The definition of the Abnormality of cell physiology is that An abnormality in a cellular process.
The definition of the Abnormality of the cell cycle is that An abnormality of the cell cycle.
The definition of the Abnormality of chromosome condensation is that An abnormality of chromosome condensation.
The definition of the Abnormality of mucopolysaccharide metabolism is that An abnormality of the metabolism of mucopolysaccharide.
The definition of the Abnormality of unsaturated fatty acid metabolism is that A deviation from the normal concentration of an unsaturated fatty acid in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of prostaglandin metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of a prostaglandin in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Abnormality of the gastrointestinal tract is that An abnormality of the gastrointestinal tract.
The definition of the Abnormality of cardiovascular system physiology is that Abnormal functionality of the cardiovascular system.
The definition of the aplasia/Hypoplasia of the vagina is that Aplasia or developmental hypoplasia of the vagina.
The definition of the Abnormality of the fallopian tube is that An abnormality of the fallopian tube.
The definition of the Abnormality of blood circulation is that An abnormality of blood circulation.
The definition of the Internal hemorrhage is that The presence of hemorrhage within the body.
The definition of the Abnormality of transition element cation homeostasis is that An abnormality of the homeostasis (concentration) of transition element cation.
The definition of the Abnormality of iron homeostasis is that An abnormality of the homeostasis (concentration) of iron cation.
The definition of the Abnormality of fluid regulation is that An abnormality of the regulation of body fluids.
The definition of the Impairment of fructose metabolism is that An impairment of a fructose metabolic process.

The definition of the Amyloidosis is that The presence of amyloid deposition in one or more tissues. Amyloidosis may be defined as the extracellular deposition of amyloid in one or more sites of the body.
The definition of the Abnormality of the renal cortex is that An abnormality of the cortex of the kidney.
The definition of the Abnormality of renal excretion is that An altered ability of the kidneys to void urine and/or specific substances.
The definition of the Decreased urine output is that A decreased rate of urine production.
The definition of the Abnormality of renal resorption is that An abnormality of renal absorption.

The definition of the Abnormality of the helix is that An abnormality of the helix. The helix is the outer rim of the ear that extends from the insertion of the ear on the scalp (root) to the termination of the cartilage at the earlobe.
The definition of the Abnormality of the intrahepatic bile duct is that An abnormality of the intrahepatic bile duct.
The definition of the aplasia/Hypoplasia of the cervical spine is that Aplasia or developmental hypoplasia of the cervical vertebral column.
The definition of the Abnormality of potassium homeostasis is that An abnormal concentration of potassium.
The definition of the Abnormality of circulating adrenocorticotropin level is that An abnormal concentration of corticotropin in the blood.
The definition of the Abnormal number of permanent teeth is that The presence of an altered number of of permanent teeth.
The definition of the Agenesis of permanent maxillary central incisor is that Agenesis of upper secondary incisor.
The definition of the Agenesis of primary maxillary central incisor is that Agenesis of upper central primary incisor.
The definition of the Agenesis of primary mandibular central incisor is that Agenesis of lower primary incisor.
The definition of the Agenesis of permanent mandibular central incisor is that Agenesis of lower secondary incisor.
The definition of the Agenesis of primary maxillary lateral incisor is that Agenesis of one or more maxillary lateral incisor, comprising the maxillary lateral primary incisor.
The definition of the Agenesis of permanent maxillary lateral incisor is that Agenesis of one or more upper lateral secondary incisor.
The definition of the Agenesis of premolar is that Agenesis of premolar tooth.
The definition of the Agenesis of maxillary premolar is that Agenesis of maxillary premolar.
The definition of the Agenesis of mandibular premolar is that Agenesis of mandibular premolar.
The definition of the Agenesis of molar is that Agenesis of molar tooth.
The definition of the Agenesis of permanent molar is that Agenesis of secondary molar tooth.
The definition of the Agenesis of first permanent molar tooth is that Agenesis of either maxillary first permanent molar or mandibular first permanent molar or both.
The definition of the Agenesis of second permanent molar is that Agenesis of either mandibular second permanent molar or maxillary second permanent molar.
The definition of the Generalized periodontitis is that A generalized form of periodontitis.
The definition of the Localized periodontitis is that A localized form of periodontitis.
The definition of the Dentinogenesis imperfecta limited to primary teeth is that Developmental dysplasia of dentin affecting only the primary dentition.
The definition of the Abnormality of dental structure is that An abnormality of the structure or composition of the teeth.
The definition of the Misalignment of incisors is that Misaligned incisor.
The definition of the Abnormality of incisor morphology is that An abnormality of morphology of the incisor tooth.
The definition of the Abnormal number of incisors is that The presence of an altered number of the incisor teeth.
The definition of the Conical incisor is that An abnormal conical morphology of the incisor tooth.
The definition of the Mesiodens is that A supernumerary tooth in the midline between the maxillary central incisors.
The definition of the Odontoma is that The presence of an odontoma.
The definition of the Increased number of teeth is that A supernumerary tooth in the midline between the maxillary central incisors.
The definition of the Abnormality of molar morphology is that An abnormality of morphology of molar tooth.
The definition of the Abnormality of permanent molar morphology is that An abnormality of morphology of permanent molar.
The definition of the Abnormality of dental color is that A developmental defect of tooth color.
The definition of the Localized hypoplasia of dental enamel is that A localized form of developmental hypoplasia of the dental enamel.
The definition of the Green teeth is that A green staining of teeth. [PMID:12686928]
The definition of the Abnormality of premolar is that An abnormality of premolar tooth.
The definition of the Abnormality of molar is that An abnormality of molar tooth.
The definition of the Abnormality of canine is that An abnormality of canine tooth.
The definition of the Impacted tooth is that A tooth that has not erupted because of local impediments (overcrowding or fibrous gum overgrowth).
The definition of the Abnormality of premolar morphology is that An abnormality of morphology of premolar tooth.
The definition of the Incisor macrodontia is that Increased size of the incisor tooth.
The definition of the Conical primary incisor is that An abnormal conical morphology of the primary incisor.
The definition of the Conical maxillary incisor is that An abnormal conical morphology of either maxillary primary incisor tooth or maxillary permanent incisor tooth or both.
The definition of the Hypocalcification of dental enamel is that A form of hypomineralization of enamel characterized by reduced calcification. [PMID:18499550]
The definition of the Hypomature dental enamel is that A form of hypomineralization of enamel characterized by a chalky appearance of the enamel with orange, brown, or white color.
The definition of the Dentinogenesis imperfecta of primary and permanent teeth is that Developmental dysplasia of dentin or both the primary dentition and the permanent dentition.

The definition of the Talon cusp is that Talon cusp is an accessory cusp located near the cingulum (the portion of the lingual or palatal aspect of the tooth that forms a convex protuberance at the cervical third of the anatomic crown).
The definition of the Dens in dente is that An abnormality of the incisor characterized by invagination of the enamel, giving a radiographic appearance that suggests a tooth within a tooth.
The definition of the Double tooth is that Fusion of two adjacent teeth.
The definition of the Fused teeth is that The union of two separately developing tooth germs typically leading to one less tooth than normal in the affected dental arch. [PMID:18167487]
The definition of the Gemination is that The development of two teeth from a single tooth bud, leading to a larger fused tooth. [PMID:18167487]

The definition of the Mulberry molar is that Mulberry molars are irregular teeth generally affecting the first molars and are characterized by a grossly deformed crown imitating, as the name implies, the surface of a mulberry. []
The definition of the Molarization of premolar is that Increased size and molar morphology of premolar tooth.

The definition of the Overbite is that Maxillary teeth cover the mandibular teeth when biting to an increased degree. The feature is defined as a vertical overlap of the maxillary incisors over the mandibular incisors that exceeds 2 mm.
The definition of the Overjet is that An abnormal anteroposterior extension of the maxillary teeth beyond the plane of the mandibular teeth upon jaw closure.
The definition of the Peripheral demyelination is that A loss of myelin from the internode regions along myelinated nerve fibers of the peripheral nervous system.

The definition of the Epileptic spasms is that A sudden flexion, extension, or mixed extension-flexion of predominantly proximal and truncal muscles that is usually more sustained than a myoclonic movement but not as sustained as a tonic seizure. Limited forms may occur: Grimacing, head nodding, or subtle eye movements. Epileptic spasms frequently occur in clusters. Infantile spasms are the best known form, but spasms can occur at all ages [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060]

The definition of the Speech apraxia is that A type of apraxia that is characterized by difficulty or inability to execute speech movements because of problems with coordination and motor problems, leading to incorrect articulation. An increase of errors with increasing word and phrase length may occur.
The definition of the Spastic hemiplegia is that Unilateral paresis (weakness) with spasticity of the affected muscles and increased tendon reflexes.
The definition of the Intestinal atresia is that An abnormal closure, or atresia of the tubular structure of the intestine.
The definition of the Ileal atresia is that An abnormal closure, or atresia of the tubular structure of the ileum.
The definition of the Abnormality of the left ventricular outflow tract is that An abnormality of the outflow tract of the left ventricle.
The definition of the Abnormality of blood volume homeostasis is that An abnormality in the amount of volume occupied by intravascular blood.
The definition of the Hypervolemia is that An increase in the amount of intravascular fluid, particularly in the volume of the circulating blood.
The definition of the Hypovolemia is that An decrease in the amount of intravascular fluid, particularly in the volume of the circulating blood.

The definition of the Recurrent aphthous stomatitis is that Recurrent episodes of ulceration of the oral mucosa, typically presenting as painful, sharply circumscribed fibrin-covered mucosal defects with a hyperemic border.
The definition of the Recurrent sinusitis is that A recurrent form of sinusitis.
The definition of the Chronic sinusitis is that A chronic form of sinusitis.

The definition of the Tonsillitis is that Inflammation of the tonsils that has occurred repeatedly. The definition of recurrent may vary somewhat, but the criteria used recently as a measure of severity were five or more episodes of true tonsillitis per year, symptoms recurring for at least a year, and episodes that are disabling and that prevent normal functioning. In some cases recurrent tonsillitis may be related to immunosusceptibility. Evidence exists for a genetic predisposition for recurrent tonsillitis.
The definition of the Abnormality of immune serum protein physiology is that An abnormality of the concentration or function of circulating immune proteins.

The definition of the Abnormality of serum cytokine level is that Abnormality of the cytokine levels in the blood, i.e., an abnormality of any of the non-antibody proteins made by inflammatory leukocytes and some non-leukocytic cells that affect the behavior of other cells.

The definition of the Abnormality of cytokine secretion is that An abnormality in the production or cellular release of a cytokine (i.e., any of the non-antibody proteins made by inflammatory leukocytes and some non-leukocytic cells that affect the behavior of other cells).

The definition of the Defective production of NFKB1-dependent cytokines is that An impairment in the production by leukocytes of NFKB1-dependent cytokines such as tumor necrosis factor-alpha and interferon-alpha.
The definition of the Abnormality of the nasal dorsum is that An abnormality of the nasal dorsum, also known as the nasal ridge.
The definition of the Concave nasal ridge is that Nasal ridge curving posteriorly to an imaginary line that connects the nasal root and tip.
The definition of the Abnormality of skin morphology is that Any morphological abnormality of the skin.
The definition of the Abnormality of skin physiology is that Any abnormality of the physiological function of the skin.

The definition of the Inflammatory abnormality of the skin is that The presence of inflammation of the skin. That is, an abnormality of the skin resulting from the local accumulation of fluid, plasma proteins, and leukocytes.
The definition of the Abnormality of epidermal morphology is that An abnormality of the morphology of the epidermis.

The definition of the Abnormality of dermal melanosomes is that An abnormality of the melanosomes, i.e., of the cellular organelles in which melanin pigments are synthesized and stored within melanocytes (the cells that produce pigment in the dermis).
The definition of the Nephroptosis is that A significant descent of the kidney as the patient moves from the supine to the erect position.
The definition of the Perioral eczema is that A type of eczema that occurs in the lips and perioral area.

The definition of the Acute esophageal necrosis is that A condition characterized by necrosis of the mucosal and submucosal layers of the esophagus not related to ingestion of caustic or other injurious agents. Endoscopically, there is a dark lesion ('black esophagus') distributed in a circumferential manner in the distal one-third of the esophagus with or without exudates. There is involvement of the distal esophagus ending sharply at the gastroesophageal junction.
The definition of the Bilateral fetal pyelectasis is that A bilateral form of fetal pyelectasis.
The definition of the Abnormality of renal calyx morphology is that Any abnormality of the morphology of the major calices or minor calices of the kidney.
The definition of the Perianal rash is that The presence of a rash (change of color and texture) of the perianal skin.

The definition of the Chronic furunculosis is that A furuncle (boil) is a skin infection involving an entire hair follicle and nearby skin tissue. Chronic furunculosis refers to recurrent episodes of furuncles, often caused by recurrent staphylococcus infection.
The definition of the Increased sensitivity to ionizing radiation is that An abnormally increased sensitivity to the effects of ionizing radiation.
The definition of the Low-grade fever is that Mild fever that does not exceed 38.5 degrees centigrade.
The definition of the aplasia/Hypoplasia of the sweat glands is that Absence or developmental hypoplasia of the sweat glands.
The definition of the aplasia of the sweat glands is that Absence of the sweat glands.
The definition of the Non-pruritic urticaria is that Pale reddish slightly elevated papules and plaques of 0.5-3 cm in diameter and not accompanied by pruritus.

The definition of the Abnormality of skin adnexa is that An abnormality of the skin adnexa (skin appendages), which are specialized skin structures located within the dermis and focally within the subcutaneous fatty tissue, comprising three histologically distinct structures: (1) the pilosebaceous unit (hair follicle and sebaceous glands); (2) the eccrine sweat glands; and (3) the apocrine glands.

The definition of the Gastric duplication is that Gastric duplication is a usually cystic malformation of gastrointestinal tract, usually attached to the greater curvature of the stomach and has no communication with the stomach.

The definition of the Gastrointestinal duplication is that A spherical hollow structure with a smooth muscle coat, lined by a mucous membrane, and attached to any part of the gastrointestinal tract, from the base of the tongue to the anus.
The definition of the Age-related cataract is that A type of cataract (opacification of the lens) that forms during the course of aging.
The definition of the Age-related nuclear cataract is that A type of age-related cataract that primarily affects the nucleus of the lens.
The definition of the Age-related cortical cataract is that A type of age-related cataract that primarily affects the cortex of the lens.

The definition of the Age-related posterior subcapsular cataract is that A type of age-related cataract consisting of granular opacities occurring mainly in the central posterior cortex just under the posterior capsule.

The definition of the Symptomatic seizures is that A seizure that occurs in the context of a brain insult (systemic, toxic, or metabolic) and may not recur when the underlying cause has been removed or the acute phase has elapsed. [PMID:18184148]

The definition of the Dialeptic seizures is that A dialeptic seizure is a type of seizure characterised predominantly by reduced responsiveness or awareness and with subsequent at least partial amnesia of the event. [PMID:9738682]

The definition of the Typical absence seizures is that A typical absence seizure is a type of generalised non-motor (absence) seizure characterised by its sudden onset, interruption of ongoing activities, a blank stare, possibly a brief upward deviation of the eyes. Usually the patient will be unresponsive when spoken to. Duration is a few seconds to half a minute with very rapid recovery. Although not always available, an EEG would usually show 3 Hz generalized epileptiform discharges during the event. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276062, PMID:28276064, PMID:6790275]

The definition of the Absence seizures with eyelid myoclonia is that An absence with eyelid myoclonia seizure is a type of generalized non-motor (absence) seizure characterised by forced upward jerking of the eyelids during an absence seizure. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:19469840, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276062, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Myoclonic absences is that Myoclonic absence seizure is a type of generalized non-motor (absence) seizure characterised by an interruption of ongoing activities, a blank stare and rhythmic three-per-second myoclonic movements, causing ratcheting abduction of the upper limbs leading to progressive arm elevation, and associated with 3 Hz generalized spike-wave discharges on the electroencephalogram. Duration is typically 10-60 s. Whilst impairment of consciousness may not be obvious the ILAE classified this seizure as a generalized non-motor seizure in 2017.

The definition of the Obtundation status is that Atypical absence status epilepticus is a type of generalized non-convulsive status epilepticus without coma that is semiologically a prolonged atypical absence seizure. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the Early onset absence seizures is that Typical absence seizures starting before the age of 4 years.

The definition of the Focal motor seizures is that A type of focal-onset seizure characterized by a motor sign as its initial semiological manifestation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1735-8178, PMID:11580774, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Focal autonomic seizures is that An autonomic seizure is a type of focal non-motor seizure characterized by alteration of autonomic nervous system function as the initial semiological feature. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Auras is that A focal sensory seizure is a type seizure beginning with a subjective sensation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1511-5893, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276062, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Auditory auras is that A seizure characterized by elementary auditory phenomena including buzzing, ringing, drumming or single tones as its first clinical manifestation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276062, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Epigastric auras is that A type of focal autonomic seizure characterised by symptoms or signs pertaining to the gastrointestinal system as the initial semiological feature. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060]

The definition of the Gustatory auras is that A seizure characterized by taste phenomena including acidic, bitter, salty, sweet, or metallic tastes as its first clinical manifestation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060]
The definition of the Olfactory Auras is that Seizures characterized by olfactory phenomena as its first clinical manifestation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]

The definition of the Somatosensory auras is that A seizure characterized by sensory phenomena including tingling, numbness, electric-shock like sensation, pain, sense of movement, or desire to move as its first clinical manifestation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060]

The definition of the Visual auras is that A seizure characterized by elementary visual hallucinations such as flashing or flickering lights/colours, or other shapes, simple patterns, scotomata, or amaurosis as its first clinical manifestation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]

The definition of the Focal myoclonic seizures is that A type of focal motor seizure characterized by sudden, brief (<100 ms) involuntary single or multiple contraction(s) of muscles(s) or muscle groups of variable topography (axial, proximal limb, distal). Myoclonus is less regularly repetitive and less sustained than is clonus. [PMID:11580774, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Focal tonic seizures is that A type of focal motor seizure characterized by sustained increase in muscle contraction, lasting a few seconds to minutes. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:11580774, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276064]
The definition of the Eyelid myoclonias is that Focal seizure with eyelid myoclonia, not eyelid myoclonias in the context of absence seizures.

The definition of the Generalized clonic seizures is that Generalized clonic seizure is a type of generalized motor seizure characterised by sustained bilateral jerking, either symmetric or asymmetric, that is regularly repetitive and involves the same muscle groups. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Myoclonic atonic seizures is that A generalized myoclonic-atonic seizure is a type of generalized motor seizure characterized by a myoclonic jerk followed by an atonic motor component. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Simple febrile seizures is that A short generalized seizure, of a duration of <15 min, not recurring within 24 h, occurring during a febrile episode not caused by an acute disease of the nervous system intracranial infection or severe metabolic disturbance. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:19125841, PMID:6779259, PMID:972656]

The definition of the Complex febrile seizures is that A febrile seizure that has any of the following features: focal semiology (or associated with post-ictal neurologic abnormalities beyond drowsiness, such as a Todd's paresis), prolonged seizure beyond 15 minutes, or recurring (occurring more than once) in a 24 hour period. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:19125841, PMID:972656]

The definition of the Hypokinetic seizures is that A type of focal non-motor seizure characterized by an arrest or pause of activities, freezing, or immobilization as the predominant semiological feature throughout the seizure. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:28276060]

The definition of the Hyperkinetic seizures is that A focal seizure characterized at onset by predominantly proximal limb or axial muscles producing irregular sequential ballistic movements, such as pedaling, pelvic thrusting, thrashing, rocking movements. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers, PMID:11580774, PMID:28276060, PMID:28276064]

The definition of the Versive seizures is that A type of focal motor seizure characterised by sustained, forced conjugate ocular, cephalic, and/or truncal rotation or lateral deviation from the midline as the initial semiological manifestation. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the EEG with constitutional variants is that An EEG with constitutional variants contains waves that are rare or unusual but not generally pathologic. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the EEG with 4-5/second background activity is that EEG background activity at 4-5/second. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the Alpha-EEG is that EEG dominated by diffuse alpha-waves (8-13Hz). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the Beta-EEG is that EEG dominated by diffuse beta-waves (>13 Hz). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the Partial beta-EEG is that EEG dominated by diffuse beta waves (>13 Hz) with occipitally localized alpha waves (8-13 Hz). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
The definition of the Low voltage EEG is that EEG with an amplitude less than 30 microvolts without observable occipital alpha rhythm (8-13 Hz). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]

The definition of the Epileptiform EEG discharges is that Epileptiform activity refers to distinctive EEG waves or complexes distinguished from background activity found in in a proportion of human subjects with epilepsy, but which can also be found in subjects without seizures. Interictal epileptiform activity refers to such activity that occurs in the absence of a clinical or subclinical seizure.

The definition of the EEG with hyperventilation-induced focal epileptiform discharges is that Focal epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]

The definition of the EEG with hyperventilation-induced generalized epileptiform discharges is that Generalized epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]

The definition of the EEG with focal epileptiform discharges is that EEG discharges recorded in particular areas of a localized (focal) abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]

The definition of the Focal epileptiform discharges with limited propagation to contralateral hemisphere is that Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to contralateral hemisphere but without secondary generalization. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:jalbers]
