The definition of the Abnormality of skeletal muscle fiber size is that Any abnormality of the size of the skeletal muscle cell.

The definition of the Pyuria is that The presence of 10 or more white cells per cubic millimeter in a urine specimen, 3 or more white cells per high-power field of unspun urine, a positive result on Gram staining of an unspun urine specimen, or a urinary dipstick test that is positive for leukocyte esterase.
The definition of the Abnormal urinary color is that An abnormal color of the urine, that is, the color of the urine appears different from the usual straw-yellow color.
The definition of the Abnormal mitochondrial shape is that An anomaly in the surface contour of mitochondria.
The definition of the Abnormal urinary odor is that A deviation from the normal odor of the urine.
The definition of the Arteritis is that Arterial inflammation.
The definition of the Abnormality of pancreas physiology is that An anomaly of the function of the pancreas.
The definition of the Abnormality of exocrine pancreas physiology is that A functional anomaly of the acinar gland portion of the pancreas that secretes digestive enzymes.
The definition of the Abnormality of endocrine pancreas physiology is that A function abnormality of the endocrine pancreas.
The definition of the Abnormal pancreas size is that A deviation from the normal size of the pancreas.
The definition of the Multiple joint dislocation is that Dislocation of many joints.

The definition of the Intracranial epidermoid cyst is that A congenital inclusion cysts that arises from ectodermal cells that normally form skin cells being left behind in the nervous system during development.

The definition of the Intracranial dermoid cyst is that A congenital inclusion cysts that arises from the inclusion of ectodermally committed cells at the time of neural tube closure (3rd-5th week of embryogenesis). The capsule of dermoid cysts consists of simple epithelium supported by collagen. In thicker parts, the lining is supplemented with dermis containing hair follicles, sebaceous glands, and apocrine glands.
The definition of the Edema of the dorsum of feet is that An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin on the back of the feet.
The definition of the Abnormality of circulating catecholamine level is that An abnormal catecholamine concentration in the blood.
The definition of the Abnormal circulating creatinine level is that An abnormal concentration of creatinine in the blood.
The definition of the Decreased serum creatinine is that An abnormally reduced amount of creatinine in the blood.
The definition of the Abnormal mitochondrial number is that A deviation from the normal number of mitochondria per cell.

The definition of the Abnormality of the mitochondrion is that An anomaly of the mitochondrion, the membranous cytoplasmic organelle the interior of which is subdivided by cristae. The mitochondrion is a self replicating organelle that is the site of tissue respiration.
The definition of the Parietal cortical atrophy is that Atrophy of the parietal cortex.
The definition of the Occipital cortical atrophy is that Atrophy of the occipital cortex.
The definition of the Rhizomelic leg shortening is that Disproportionate shortening of the proximal segment of the leg (i.e. the femur).
The definition of the Increased fibular diameter is that Increased width of the cross sectional diameter of the fibula.
The definition of the Primary open angle glaucoma is that A type of glaucoma defined by an open, normal appearing anterior chamber angle and raised intraocular pressure,
The definition of the Primary angle closure glaucoma is that A type of glaucomatous optic neuropathy in an eye that has evidence of angle closure (i.e. significant iridotrabecular contact).
The definition of the Hypoplasia of the pons is that Underdevelopment of the pons.
The definition of the Abnormality of circulating glucocorticoid level is that An abnormality of the concentration of a glucocorticoid in the blood.
The definition of the Abnormality of circulating corticosterone level is that An abnormality of the concentration of corticosterone in the blood.

The definition of the Abnormality of creatine metabolism is that A deviation from the normal concentration of creatine in the blood circulation. Creatine is a derivative of glycine having methyl and amidino groups attached to the nitrogen. Creatine is naturally produced from amino acids, primarily in liver and kidney, and acts as an energy source for cells, primarly for muscle cells.
The definition of the Endometrial carcinoma is that A carcinoma of the endometrium, the mucous lining of the uterus.
The definition of the Hepatitis is that Inflammation of the liver.
The definition of the Abnormal albumin level is that Deviation from normal concentration of albumin in the blood.
The definition of the Hyperalbuminemia is that Elevation in the concentration of albumin in the blood.
The definition of the Laryngeal carcinoma is that A carcinoma of the larynx.

The definition of the Methemoglobinemia is that Abnormally increased levels of methemoglobin in the blood. In this form of hemoglobin, there is an oxidized ferric iron (Fe +3) rather than the reduced ferrous form (Fe 2+) that is normally found in hemoglobin. Methemoglobin has a reduced affinity for oxygen, resulting in a reduced ability to release oxygen to tissues.
The definition of the Methylmalonic aciduria is that Increased concentration of methylmalonic acid in the urine.
The definition of the Panuveitis is that Inflammation of the uveal tract in which inflammation affects the anterior chamber, vitreous, retina or choroid.
The definition of the Anterior uveitis is that Inflammation of the uveal tract in which the primary site of inflammation is the anterior chamber.
The definition of the Posterior uveitis is that Inflammation of the uveal tract in which the primary site of inflammation is the retina or choroid.
The definition of the Intermediate uveitis is that Inflammation of the uveal tract in which the primary site of inflammation is the vitreous.
The definition of the Prostate cancer is that A cancer of the prostate.
The definition of the Stomach cancer is that A cancer arising in any part of the stomach.
The definition of the Uraciluria is that Increased concentration of uracil in the urine.
The definition of the Basal ganglia necrosis is that Death of cells in the basal ganglia.
The definition of the Abnormality of cells of the erythroid lineage is that Any structural abnormality of erythrocytes (red-blood cells).
The definition of the Abnormal number of erythroid precursors is that A deviation from the normal count of erythroid precursor cells, that is, erythroid lineage cells in the bone marrow.
The definition of the Erythroid hyperplasia is that Increased count of erythroid precursor cells, that is, erythroid lineage cells in the bone marrow.
The definition of the Erythroid hypoplasia is that Decreased count of erythroid precursor cells, that is, erythroid lineage cells in the bone marrow.
The definition of the Abnormality of cells of the granulocytic lineage is that An anomaly of cells involved in the formation of a granulocytes, that is, of the granulocytopoietic cell.
The definition of the Granulocytic hypoplasia is that Decreased number of granulocyte precursors in the bone marrow.
The definition of the Pancreatic squamous cell carcinoma is that A subtype of ductal pancreatic carcinoma that is thought to originate from squamous metaplasia of pancreatic ductal epithelium.

The definition of the Abnormality of cells of the megakaryocyte lineage is that Any structural anomaly of megakaryocytes. Mature blood platelets are released from the cytoplasm of megakaryocytes, which are bone-marrow resident cells. []

The definition of the Abnormality of von Willebrand factor is that Decreased quantity or activity of von Willebrand factor. Von Willebrand factor mediates the adhesion of platelets to the collagen exposed on endothelial cell surfaces.
The definition of the Reduced quantity of Von Willebrand factor is that Decreased quantity of von Willebrand factor.
The definition of the Multiple lineage myelodysplasia is that Myelodysplasia with dysplastic changes in two or more of the myeloid lineages: erythroid, granulocytic, megakaryocytic.
The definition of the Bilineage myelodysplasia is that Myelodysplasia with dysplastic changes in two of the myeloid lineages: erythroid, granulocytic, megakaryocytic.
The definition of the Single lineage myelodysplasia is that Abnormality/dysplasia of a single myeloid cell (erythroid, granulocytic, or megakaryocytic).
The definition of the Hemothorax is that The presence of blood in the pleural space.
The definition of the Foveoschisis is that Splitting of the retinal layers in the macula.
The definition of the Hypotriglyceridemia is that An decrease in the level of triglycerides in the blood.
The definition of the Anhedonia is that Inability to experience pleasurable activities usually found enjoyable. []
The definition of the Decreased corneal sensation is that Reduced ability of the cornea to respond to stimulation.
The definition of the Hemophagocytosis is that Phagocytosis by macrophages of erythrocytes, leukocytes, platelets, and their precursors in bone marrow and other tissues.

The definition of the Subcortical cerebral atrophy is that Atrophy of the cerebral subcortical white and gray matter, termed subcortical atrophy, reflects loss of nerve cells in the basal ganglia or fibers in the deep white matter.
The definition of the Carotid artery dissection is that A separation (dissection) of the layers of the carotid artery wall.
The definition of the Internal carotid artery dissection is that A separation (dissection) of the layers of the internal carotid artery wall.
The definition of the Intracranial internal carotid artery dissection is that A separation (dissection) of the layers of the intracranial portion of the internal carotid artery wall.
The definition of the External carotid artery dissection is that A separation (dissection) of the layers of the external carotid artery wall.
The definition of the Common carotid artery dissection is that A separation (dissection) of the layers of the common carotid artery wall.
The definition of the Carotid artery aneurysm is that A dilatation (balooning or bulging out of the vessel wall) of a carotid artery.
The definition of the Asterixis is that A clinical sign indicating a lapse of posture and is usually manifest by a bilateral flapping tremor at the wrist, metacarpophalangeal, and hip joints.
The definition of the Oligodactyly is that A developmental defect resulting in the presence of fewer than the normal number of digits.
The definition of the Skin-picking is that Repetitive and compulsive picking of skin which results in tissue damage.
The definition of the Hair-pulling is that A phenomenon in which persons repetitively pull out their own hair, resulting in noticeable hair loss.
The definition of the Head-banging is that Habitual striking of one's own head against a surface such as a mattress or wall of a crib. []
The definition of the Self-biting is that Habitual biting of one's own body.
The definition of the Nail-biting is that Habitual biting of one's own fingernails. []
The definition of the Stereotypical hand wringing is that Habitual clasping and wringing of the hands in the middle of the body, similar to a hand-washing movement. [PMID:28838622]
The definition of the Stereotypical body rocking is that Habitual repetitive movement of the entire body, front to back or side to side. []
The definition of the Orthostatic tachycardia is that An increase in heart rate with standing of 30 beats per minute or more.

The definition of the Glioblastoma multiforme is that A tumor arising from glia in the central nervous system with macroscopic regions of necrosis and hemorrhage. Microscopically, glioblastoma multiforme is characterized by regions of pseudopalisading necrosis, pleomorphic nuclei and cells, and microvascular proliferation.

The definition of the Resistance to activated protein C is that Poor anticoagulant response to activated protein C. A plasma is termed 'APC resistant' when the addition of exogenous APC fails to prolong its clotting time in an activated partial thromboplastin time assay.

The definition of the Abnormality of natural killer cells is that An anomaly of the natural killer cell, which is a lymphocyte that can spontaneously kill a variety of target cells without prior antigenic activation via germline encoded activation receptors. It also regulates immune responses via cytokine release and direct contact with other cells.
The definition of the Abnormal natural killer cell physiology is that A functional anomaly of the natural killer cell.
The definition of the Reduced natural killer cell activity is that Reduced ability of the natural killer cell to function in the adaptive immune response.

The definition of the Craniofacial dystonia is that A form of focal dystonia affecting the face and especially the jaw that is induced by the act of speaking. It is an involuntary contraction of the masticatory muscles, resulting in dysarthria or dysphagia.

The definition of the Cystic medial necrosis is that A disorder of large arteries, in particular the aorta, characterized by an accumulation of basophilic ground substance in the media with cyst-like lesions associated with degenerative changes of collagen, elastin and the vascular smooth muscle cells.

The definition of the Entrapment neuropathy is that Malfunction of a peripheral nerve resulting from mechanical compression of the nerve roots from internal or external causes and leading to a conduction block or axonal loss.
The definition of the Oropharyngeal squamous cell carcinoma is that A squamous cell carcinoma that originates in the oropharnyx.
The definition of the Hyperalphalipoproteinemia is that An elevated concentration of high-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDL) in the blood.

The definition of the Constrictive median neuropathy is that Injury to the median nerve caused by its entrapment at the wrist as it traverses through the carpal tunnel. Clinically, constrictive median neuropathy is characterized by pain, paresthesia, and weakness in the median nerve distribution of the hand.

The definition of the Entrapment neuropathy of the ulnar nerve at elbow is that An entrapment neuropathy of the ulnar nerve in the cubital tunnel (in the elbow) characterized by numbness in the ring and little fingers and weakness of the intrinsic muscles in the hand.
The definition of the Increased erythrocyte protoporphyrin concentration is that Concentration of protoporphyrins in erythrocytes above the upper limit of normal.
The definition of the Hyperemesis gravidarum is that Excessive vomiting in early pregnancy, leading to the loss of 5% or more of body weight.
The definition of the Hodgkin lymphoma is that A type of lymphoma characterized microscopically by multinucleated Reed-Sternberg cells.
The definition of the T-cell lymphoma is that A type of lymphoma that originates in T-cells.
The definition of the B-cell lymphoma is that A type of lymphoma that originates in B-cells.
The definition of the Cutaneous T-cell lymphoma is that A type of T-cell lymphoma that exhibits malignant infiltration of the skin.

The definition of the Anaplastic large-cell lymphoma is that A type of T-cell lymphoma that is characterized by so-called hallmark cells with a pleomorphic appearance that express the CD30 antigen, are lobulated, and have indented nuclei.
The definition of the Episodic hemiplegia is that Transient episodes of weakness of the arm, leg, and in some cases the face on one side of the body.
The definition of the Irregular respiration is that Uneven rhythm of breathing.

The definition of the Cheyne-Stokes respiration is that An abnormal pattern of respiration characterized by cycles of respiration that are increasingly deeper then shallower with possible periods of apnea. Affected patients may display a 10 to 20 second episode of hypoventilation or apnea, followed by respiration of increased depth and frequency over the course of about one minute. The cycle repeats every 45 seconds to 3 minutes.
The definition of the Insulinoma is that A type of tumor of the pancreatic beta cells that secretes excess insulin and can result in hypoglycemia.

The definition of the Juvenile colonic polyposis is that The presence of more than 5 juvenile polyps of the colon. The term juvenile polyps refer to a special histopathology and not the age of onset as the polyp might be diagnosed at all ages. The juvenile polyp has a spherical appearance and is microscopically characterized by overgrowth of an oedematous lamina propria with inflammatory cells and cystic glands.
The definition of the Cluster headache is that A type of headache characterized by repeated attacks of unilateral pain lasting 15 to 180 minutes and associated with local autonomic signs.

The definition of the Abnormality of prothrombin is that An anomaly of clotting factor II, which is known as prothrombin, a vitamin K-dependent proenzyme that functions in the blood coagulation cascade.
The definition of the increased serum bile acid concentration is that An increase in the concentration of bile acid in the blood.
The definition of the Onychomycosis is that A fungal infection of the toenails or fingernails that tends to cause the nails to thicken, discolor, disfigure, and split.
The definition of the Recurrent vulvovaginal candidiasis is that Recurrent infection involving the vulva, vagina, and adjacent crural areas, whereby the causative agent belongs to the genus Candida.
The definition of the Globozoospermia is that Any structural anomaly of the acrosome resulting in a round sperm head.
The definition of the Abnormal sperm motility is that An anomaly of the mobility of ejaculated sperm.
The definition of the Reduced sperm motility is that An abnormal reduction in the mobility of ejaculated sperm.
The definition of the Nonmotile sperm is that A lack of mobility of ejaculated sperm.

The definition of the Juvenile myelomonocytic leukemia is that Juvenile myelomonocytic leukemia (JMML) is a lethal myeloproliferative disease of young childhood characterized clinically by overproduction of myelomonocytic cells and by the in vitro phenotype of hematopoietic progenitor hypersensitivity to granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor.
The definition of the Abnormal renal morphology is that Any structural anomaly of the kidney.
The definition of the Abnormal renal physiology is that An abnormal functionality of the kidney.

The definition of the Abnormal glomerular filtration rate is that An abnormally increased or reduced amount of fluid filtered out of plasma through glomerular capillary walls into Bowman's capsules per unit of time.

The definition of the Decreased glomerular filtration rate is that An abnormal reduction in the volume of fluid filtered out of plasma through glomerular capillary walls into Bowman's capsules per unit of time.

The definition of the Increased glomerular filtration rate is that An abnormal rise in the volume of water filtered out of plasma through glomerular capillary walls into Bowman's capsules per unit of time.
The definition of the Testicular microlithiasis is that The deposition of calcium phosphate microliths within the seminiferous tubules.

The definition of the Entrapment neuropathy of suprascapular nerve is that An entrapment neuropathy of the suprascapular nerve, presenting with shoulder weakness confined to the supraspinatus muscle (this muscle initiates shoulder abduction) or to the infraspinatus (this muscle externally rotates the arm), as well as with pain in the posterior part of the shoulder and upper periscapular region.
The definition of the Increased urinary porphobilinogen is that The concentration of porphobilinogen in the urine, normalized for urine concentration, is above the upper limit of normal.

The definition of the Alveolar soft part sarcoma is that A type of soft tissue sarcoma with a histological appearance reminiscent of alveoli because of its reticulated fibrous stroma enclosing groups of sarcoma cells, which resemble epithelial cells and are enclosed in alveoli walled with connective tissue.

The definition of the Erythema nodosum is that An erythematous eruption commonly associated with drug reactions or infection and characterized by inflammatory nodules that are usually tender, multiple, and bilateral.

The definition of the Non-caseating epithelioid cell granulomatosis is that The presence of multiple epithelioid cell granulomas consist of highly differentiated mononuclear phagocytes (epithelioid cells and giant cells) and lymphocytes, not exhibiting caseation (a form of necrosis in which the tissue changes into a dry, amorphous mass said to resemble cheese).
The definition of the Pretibial blistering is that A type of blistering that affects the skin of the tibial region.
The definition of the Arachnoid hemangiomatosis is that The presence of multiple hemangiomas in the arachnoid.
The definition of the Splenic rupture is that A breach of the capsule of the spleen.
The definition of the Circulating immune complexes is that Persistence of immune complexes in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Oligodontia of primary teeth is that Reduced number of primary teeth.
The definition of the Ovarian teratoma is that The presence of a teratoma in the ovary.
The definition of the Urethral stricture is that Narrowing of the urethra associated with inflammation or scar tissue.

The definition of the Tension-type headache is that A type of headache that last hours with continuous pain of mild or moderate intensity, bilateral location, a pressing/tightening (non-pulsating) quality and that is not aggravated by routine physical activity such as walking or climbing stairs.
The definition of the CSF pleocytosis is that An increased white blood cell count in the cerebrospinal fluid.

The definition of the Rhegmatogenous retinal detachment is that A type of retinal detachment associated with a retinal tear, that is, with a break in the retina that allows fluid to pass from the vitreous space into the subretinal space between the sensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium.

The definition of the Exudative retinal detachment is that A type of retinal detachment arising from damage to the outer blood-retinal barrier that allows fluid to access the subretinal space and separate the neurosensory retina from the retinal pigment epithelium.
The definition of the Shortened QT interval is that Decreased time between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).
The definition of the Intramuscular hematoma is that Blood clot formed within muscle tissue following leakage of blood into the tissue.
The definition of the Agranulocytosis is that Marked decrease in the number of granulocytes.
The definition of the Drug-induced agranulocytosis is that A type of agranulocytosis related to ingestion of a specific medication.
The definition of the Elevated sweat chloride is that An increased concentration of chloride in the sweat.
The definition of the Urocanic aciduria is that An increased concentration of urocanic acid in the urine.

The definition of the Hyperchylomicronemia is that Increased plasma concentrations of chylomicrons, the large lipid droplet (up to 100 mm in diameter) of reprocessed lipid synthesized in epithelial cells of the small intestine and containing triacylglycerols, cholesterol esters, and several apolipoproteins.
The definition of the Atransferrinemia is that Absence of transferrin, a protein that transports iron, in the blood.

The definition of the Increased intramyocellular lipid droplets is that An abnormal increase in intracellular lipid droplets In a muscle. The number and size of these drops can increase with somd disorders of lipid metabolism affecting muscle. See PMID 20691590 for histological images.
The definition of the Levator palpebrae superioris atrophy is that Atrophy of the levator palpebrae superioris, the extraocular muscle that elevates the superior eyelid.
The definition of the Superior rectus atrophy is that Atrophy of the superior rectus, the extraocular muscle whose primary function is to elevate the globe.
The definition of the Abnormal genital system morphology is that A structural or developmental anomaly of any of the tissues involved in the genital system.
The definition of the Abnormal sex determination is that Anomaly of primary or secondary sexual development or characteristics.
The definition of the Sex reversal is that Development of the reproductive system is inconsistent with the chromosomal sex.
The definition of the Oculomotor nerve palsy is that Reduced ability to control the movement of the eye associated with damage to the third cranial nerve (the oculomotor nerve).
The definition of the Specific anosmia is that Anosmia for one particular odor.
The definition of the Prolonged PR interval is that Increased time for the PR interval (beginning of the P wave to the beginning of the QRS complex).

The definition of the Abnormal ST segment is that An electrocardiographic anomaly of the ST segment, which is the segment that connects the QRS complex and the T wave. The ST segment normally has a duration of 80 to 120 ms, is flat and at the same level (isoelectric) as the PR and TP segment.
The definition of the ST segment depression is that An electrocardiographic anomaly in which the ST segment is observed to be located inferior to the isoelectric line.
The definition of the ST segment elevation is that An electrocardiographic anomaly in which the ST segment is observed to be located superior to the isoelectric line.
The definition of the Abnormal respiratory system morphology is that A structural anomaly of the respiratory system.

The definition of the Abnormal respiratory epithelium morphology is that Any structural anomaly of the pseudostratified ciliated epithelium that lines much of the conducting portion of the airway, including part of the nasal cavity and larynx, the trachea, and bronchi.
The definition of the Ewing's sarcoma is that A malignant tumor of the bone which always arises in the medullary tissue, occurring more often in cylindrical bones.
The definition of the Dynein arm defect of motile cilia is that An anomaly of the dynein arms of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.

The definition of the Absent outer dynein arms is that Absence of the outer dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, which normally are situated outside of the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.

The definition of the Absent inner dynein arms is that Absence of the inner dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, which normally are situated within the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.

The definition of the Abnormal axonemal organization of motile cilia is that Abnormal arrangement of the structures of the axoneme, which is the cytoskeletal structure that forms the inner core of the motile cilium and displays a canonical 9+2 microtubular pattern of motile cilia studded with dynein arms.

The definition of the Absent inner and outer dynein arms is that Complete absence of the dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, that is, absence of the inner and the outer dynein arms, which normally are situated inside and outside of the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.

The definition of the Abnormal central microtubular pair morphology of motile cilia is that A structural anomaly of the two central microtubules of motile cilia with a 9+2 microtubuluar configuration.
The definition of the Abnormal respiratory motile cilium physiology is that Any functional anomaly of the respiratory motile cilia.

The definition of the Abnormal ciliary motility is that Any anomaly of the normal motility of motile cilia. Evaluation of ciliary beat frequency and ciliary beat pattern requires high-speed videomicroscopy of freshly obtained ciliary biopsies that are maintained in culture media under controlled conditions.
The definition of the Absent central microtubular pair morphology of motile cilia is that Absence of the two central microtubules of motile cilia with a 9+2 microtubuluar configuration.

The definition of the Ciliary dyskinesia is that A deviation from the normally well coordinated pattern of intracellular and intercellular synchrony of motile cilia. Dyskinetic cilia usually beat out of synchrony relative to neighboring cilia.
The definition of the T-wave alternans is that A periodic beat-to-beat variation in the amplitude or shape of the T wave in an EKG.
The definition of the Absent ciliary axoneme radial spokes is that Absence of the radial spokes of the axoneme of the respiratory cilium.
The definition of the Myxoid liposarcoma is that A liposarcoma that contains myxomatous tissue.
The definition of the Abnormal muscle glycogen content is that Any anomaly in the amount of glycogen in muscle tissue.
The definition of the Decreased muscle glycogen content is that A decreased amount of glycogen in muscle tissue.
The definition of the Episodic upper airway obstruction is that Intermittent episodes of increased resistance to the passage of air in the upper airway.
The definition of the J wave is that The J wave is a positive convex deflection that occurs at the junction of the QRS complex and ST segment, the J-point.
The definition of the Increased carotid artery intimal medial thickness is that An increase in the combined thickness of the intima and media of the carotid artery.

The definition of the Digital flexor tenosynovitis is that Inflammation of the flexor digitorum tendon, often associated with the Kanavel signs: (i) finger held in slight flexion, (ii) fusiform swelling, (iii) tenderness along the flexor tendon sheath, and (iv) pain with passive extension of the digit.
The definition of the Hypoglycinemia is that An abnormally reduced concentration of glycine in the blood.
The definition of the Abnormality of serine metabolism is that Any deviation from the normal concentration of serine in the blood circulation.
The definition of the Hyposerinemia is that Reduced concentration of serine in the blood.
The definition of the Hepatic amyloidosis is that A form of amyloidosis that affects the liver.
The definition of the Chylous ascites is that Extravasation of chyle into the peritoneal cavity.

The definition of the Morbilliform rash is that An exanthema consisting of widespread pink-to-red macules (flat spots of 2-10 mm in diameter) or papules (red bumps) that blanch with pressure. The macules and papules may cluster and merge to form sheets over several days.
The definition of the Small distal femoral epiphysis is that Reduced size of the Distal epiphysis of femur.
The definition of the Small proximal tibial epiphyses is that Reduced size of the proximal epiphysis of the tibia.
The definition of the Abnormal hypothalamus physiology is that An abnormal functionality of the hypothalamus.
The definition of the Abnormal hypothalamus morphology is that Any structural anomaly of the hypothalamus.
The definition of the Hypothalamic luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone deficiency is that Decreased secretion of luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone by the hypothalamus.

The definition of the Neoplasm of head and neck is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the head and neck region with origin in the lip, oral cavity, nasal cavity, paranasal sinuses, pharynx, or larynx.
The definition of the Facial neoplasm is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the face.
The definition of the Fusion of gums is that A congenital defect with an abnormal joining of the gums of the upper and lower jaw.
The definition of the Abnormal genital pigmentation is that An abnormal pigmentation pattern of the external genitalia.
The definition of the Abnormality of the occipital bone is that Abnormality of the occipital bone of the skull.
The definition of the Slender middle phalanx of finger is that Reduced diameter of the middle phalanx of finger.
The definition of the Slender distal phalanx of finger is that Reduced diameter of the distal phalanx of finger.
The definition of the Slender proximal phalanx of finger is that Reduced diameter of the proximal phalanx of finger.
The definition of the Long middle  phalanx of finger is that Increased length of the middle phalanx of finger.
The definition of the Long distal phalanx of finger is that Increased length of the distal phalanx of finger.
The definition of the Ureteral agenesis is that Failure of the ureter to undergo development.
The definition of the Type II transferrin isoform profile is that Abnormal transferrin isoform profile consistent with a type II congenital disorder of glycosylation.
The definition of the Herpes simplex encephalitis is that Infection of the brain parenchyma with herpes simplex virus, resulting in inflammation of the brain parenchyma with neurologic dysfunction.
The definition of the Abnormality of the aortic arch is that An anomaly of the arch of aorta.
The definition of the Hypoplastic aortic arch is that Underdevelopment of the arch of aorta.
The definition of the Coarctation of the descending aortic arch is that Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized to the region of the descending trunk of arch of aorta.
The definition of the Abnormal rib ossification is that An anomaly of the process of rib bone formation.
The definition of the Spatulate ribs is that Ribs that are increased in width and taper to the posterior ends.
The definition of the Cutaneous amyloidosis is that The presence of amyloid deposition in the superficial dermis.

The definition of the Abnormal monocyte count is that An anomaly in the number of monocytes, which are myeloid mononuclear recirculating leukocyte that can act as a precursor of tissue macrophages, osteoclasts and some populations of tissue dendritic cells.
The definition of the Monocytosis is that An increased number of circulating monocytes.
The definition of the Monocytopenia is that An decreased number of circulating monocytes.

The definition of the Heberden node is that Bony swelling of the distal interphalangeal joint (DIP) associated with the formation of osteophytes (calcific spurs) of the articular (joint) cartilage that are visible radiographically.

The definition of the Bouchard node is that Bony swelling of the proximal interphalangeal joint (PIP) associated with the formation of osteophytes (calcific spurs) of the articular (joint) cartilage that are visible radiographically.
The definition of the Histiocytoma is that A neoplasm containing histiocytes.
The definition of the Fibrous tissue neoplasm is that Any neoplasm composed of fibrous tissue.
The definition of the Sacroiliac arthritis is that Inflammation of the sacroiliac joint, generally accompanied by lower back pain.

The definition of the Occipital neuralgia is that A distinct type of headache characterized by piercing, throbbing, or electric-shock-like chronic pain in the upper neck, back of the head, and behind the ears, usually on one side.
The definition of the Absent pigmentation of the abdomen is that Lack of skin pigmentation (coloring) of the abdomen.
The definition of the Absent pigmentation of the limbs is that Lack of skin pigmentation (coloring) of the arms and legs.
The definition of the D-2-hydroxyglutaric aciduria is that An increased concentration of 2-hydroxyglutaric acid in the urine.
The definition of the Perifolliculitis is that Inflammation surrounding hair follicles.
The definition of the Sleep myoclonus is that Myoclonus that occurs during the initial phases of sleep.
The definition of the Myeloid leukemia is that A leukemia that originates from a myeloid cell, that is the blood forming cells of the bone marrow.

The definition of the Chronic myelomonocytic leukemia is that A myelodysplastic/myeloproliferative neoplasm which is characterized by persistent monocytosis, absence of a Philadelphia chromosome and BCR/ABL fusion gene, fewer than 20 percent blasts in the bone marrow and blood, myelodysplasia, and absence of PDGFRA or PDGFRB rearrangement. [NCIT:C3178]
The definition of the Abnormality of the celiac artery is that An anomaly of the celiac artery.
The definition of the Celiac artery compression is that Compression of the celiac artery.
The definition of the Cementoma is that An odontogenic tumor of the cementum of tooth.
The definition of the Tufted angioma is that A vascular tumor of the skin and subcutaneous tissues and characterized by slow angiomatous proliferation.
The definition of the Pyelonephritis is that An inflammation of the kidney involving the parenchyma of kidney, the renal pelvis and the kidney calices.
The definition of the Abnormal autonomic nervous system morphology is that A structural abnormality of the autonomic nervous system.
The definition of the Abnormal autonomic nervous system physiology is that A functional abnormality of the autonomic nervous system.
The definition of the Abnormal sudomotor regulation is that An abnormal regulation of the sweat glands by the sympathetic nervous system associated with abnormal perspiration.
The definition of the Extrahepatic cholestasis is that Impairment of bile flow due to obstruction in large bile ducts outside the liver.
The definition of the Abnormality of folate metabolism is that An abnormality of the metabolism of folic acid, which is also known as vitamin B9.
The definition of the Abnormal homeostasis is that An anomaly in the processes involved in the maintenance of an internal equilibrium.
The definition of the Abnormal energy expenditure is that Any anomaly in the utilization of energy (calories).
The definition of the Increased resting energy expenditure is that An increase in the number of calories used per unit time.
The definition of the Decreased resting energy expenditure is that A reduction in the number of calories used per unit time.
The definition of the Microprolactinoma is that A pituitary prolactin cell adenoma of less than 10 mm diameter.
The definition of the Macroprolactinoma is that A pituitary prolactin cell adenoma of more than 10 mm diameter.
The definition of the Decreased serum ferritin is that Abnormally reduced concentration of ferritin, a ubiquitous intracellular protein that stores iron, in the blood.
The definition of the Morphea is that Isolated patches of hardened skin (scleroderma).
The definition of the Abnormal glycosylation is that An anomaly of a glycosylation process, i.e., a process involved in the covalent attachment of a glycosyl residue to a substrate molecule.

The definition of the Abnormal protein glycosylation is that An anomaly of a protein glycosylation process, i.e., of a protein modification process that results in the addition of a carbohydrate or carbohydrate derivative unit to a protein amino acid, e.g. the addition of glycan chains to proteins.

The definition of the Abnormal protein N-linked glycosylation is that An anomaly of protein N-linked glycosylation, i.e., an abnormality of the protein glycosylation process in which a carbohydrate or carbohydrate derivative unit is added to a protein via a nitrogen atom in an amino acid residue in a protein.
The definition of the Decreased galactosylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that A reduction in the amount of galactose residues of N-glycans.
The definition of the Abnormal sialylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that An anomaly of the addition of sialic acids to N-linked glycans.
The definition of the Decreased sialylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that Decreased addition of sialic acids to N-linked glycans.
The definition of the Increased sialylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that Increased addition of sialic acids to N-linked glycans.
The definition of the Abnormal fucosylation of protein N-linked glycosylation is that An anomaly of the addition of fucose sugar units to N-linked glycans.
The definition of the Decreased fucosylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that Decreased addition of fucose sugar units to N-linked glycans.
The definition of the Increased fucosylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that Increased addition of fucose sugar units to N-linked glycans.
The definition of the Abnormal mannosylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that An anomaly of the addition of mannose to N-linked glycans.
The definition of the Decreased mannosylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that Reduced addition of mannose to N-linked glycans.
The definition of the Increased mannosylation of N-linked protein glycosylation is that Increased addition of mannose to N-linked glycans.

The definition of the Abnormal protein O-linked glycosylation is that An anomaly of protein O-linked glycosylation, i.e., of the process in which a carbohydrate or carbohydrate derivative unit is added to a protein via the hydroxyl group of a serine or threonine residue.
The definition of the Abnormal fucosylation of O-linked protein glycosylation is that An anomaly of the addition of fucose sugar units to O-linked glycans.
The definition of the Decreased fucosylation of O-linked protein glycosylation is that A reduction of the addition of fucose sugar units to O-linked glycans.
The definition of the Increased fucosylation of O-linked protein glycosylation is that Increased addition of fucose sugar units to O-linked glycans.
The definition of the Abnormal sialylation of O-linked protein glycosylation is that An anomaly of the addition of sialic acids to O-linked glycans.
The definition of the Decreased sialylation of O-linked protein glycosylation is that An reduced addition of sialic acids to O-linked glycans.
The definition of the Decreased urinary potassium is that A decreased concentration of potassium(1+) in the urine.
The definition of the Hypophosphaturia is that An abnormally decreased phosphate concentration in the urine.

The definition of the Basilar invagination is that Projection of the tip of the dens more than 5 mm above a line joining the hard palate to the posterior lip of the foramen magnum (Chamberlain's line) or the tip of the dens is greater than 7 mm above McGregor's line (the back of the hard palate to the lowest point of the occipital squama).
The definition of the Extra fontanelles is that A cranial suture that is in addition to canonical membrane-covered openings in the incompletely ossified skull of the fetus or newborn infant.
The definition of the Flat face is that Absence of concavity or convexity of the face when viewed in profile. [PMID:19125436]
The definition of the Cheekbone prominence is that Large or prominent malar surface of the zygomatic bone of the skull, which is convex and forms the prominence of the 'cheek bones'.

The definition of the Midface prominence is that Abnormally anterior positioning of the infraorbital and perialar regions, or increased convexity of the face, or increased nasolabial angle. The midface includes the maxilla, the cheeks, the zygomas, and the infraorbital and perialar regions of the face
The definition of the Abnormal eye morphology is that A structural anomaly of the globe of the eye, or bulbus oculi.
The definition of the Abnormal eye physiology is that A functional anomaly of the eye.
The definition of the Chemosis is that Edema (swelling) of the bulbar conjunctiva.
The definition of the Microphakia is that Abnormal smallness of the lens.
The definition of the Hemianopsia is that Partial or complete loss of vision in one half of the visual field of one or both eyes.
The definition of the Fatigue is that A subjective feeling of tiredness characterized by a lack of energy and motivation.
The definition of the Abnormal enzyme/coenzyme activity is that Concentration or activity of an enzyme is above or below the limits of normal in the blood circulation.

The definition of the Reduced carnitine O-palmitoyltransferase activity is that Reduced carnitine O-palmitoyltransferase level, leading to a reduced activity of the reaction: palmitoyl-CoA + L-carnitine = CoA + L-palmitoylcarnitine.
The definition of the Delayed self-feeding during toddler years is that A delay in the development of skills required to feed oneself in the toddler period (between one and three years of age).
The definition of the Left-to-right shunt is that Pattern of blood flow in the heart that deviates from the normal circuit of the circulatory system from the left side of the heart to the right.

The definition of the Bidirectional shunt is that Pattern of blood flow in the heart that deviates from the normal circuit of the circulatory system from both right side of the heart to the left and vice versa.
The definition of the Rhinitis is that Inflammation of the nasal mucosa with nasal congestion.

The definition of the Camptodactyly is that The distal interphalangeal joint and/or the proximal interphalangeal joint of the fingers or toes cannot be extended to 180 degrees by either active or passive extension.
The definition of the Absent hallux is that Aplasia of the hallux, that is, a development defect such that the big toe does not develop.
The definition of the Bronchitis is that Inflammation of the large airways in the lung including any part of the bronchi from the primary bronchi to the tertiary bronchi.

The definition of the Acute bronchitis is that Inflammation of the large airways of the lung with rapid onset and short course usually associated with cough, mucus production, shortness of breath, wheezing, and chest tightness.
The definition of the Appendicular hypotonia is that Muscular hypotonia of one or more limbs.
The definition of the Anal fissure is that A small tear in the thin, moist tissue (mucosa) that lines the anus. It appears as a crack or slit in the mucous membrane of the anus.
The definition of the Hyporeflexia of upper limbs is that Reduced intensity of muscle tendon reflexes in the upper limbs. Reflexes are elicited by stretching the tendon of a muscle, e.g., by tapping.
The definition of the Jaw hyporeflexia is that Reduced intensity of muscle tendon reflexes in jaw.
The definition of the Allergy is that An allergy is an immune response or reaction to substances that are usually not harmful.
The definition of the Iodine contrast allergy is that Allergy to iodine contrast media used in radiological studies.
The definition of the Seasonal allergy is that It is characterized by one or more symptoms including sneezing, itching, nasal congestion, and rhinorrhea. [PMID:11449200]
The definition of the Biliary dyskinesia is that A motility disorder characterized by biliary colic in the absence of gallstones with a reduced gallbladder ejection fraction.
The definition of the Aortic atherosclerosis is that The presence of atheromas or atherosclerotic plaques in the aorta.
The definition of the Peripheral edema is that An abnormal accumulation of interstitial fluid in the soft tissues of the limbs.

The definition of the Pressure ulcer is that A type of ulcer that is caused when an area of skin is subject to pressure over a prolonged period of time, ranging in range in severity from patches of discolored skin to open wounds that expose the underlying bone or muscle. The most common sites are the sacrum, coccyx, heels and the hips.

The definition of the Abnormal aldolase level is that An abnormal concentration of aldolase in the serum. Aldolase is an enzyme responsible for converting fructose 1,6-bisphosphate into the triose phosphates dihydroxyacetone phosphate and glyceraldehyde 3-phosphate.
The definition of the Abnormal urine alpha-ketoglutarate concentration is that A deviation from normal of the concentration of 2-oxoglutaric acid in the urine.
The definition of the Increased urine alpha-ketoglutarate concentration is that A greater than normal concentration of 2-oxoglutaric acid in the urine.
The definition of the Decreased urine alpha-ketoglutarate concentration is that A lower than normal concentration of 2-oxoglutaric acid in the urine.
The definition of the Abnormal urine citrate concentration is that A deviation from normal of the concentration of citrate(3-) in the urine.
The definition of the Hypocitraturia is that A lower than normal concentration of citrate(3-) in the urine.
The definition of the Hypercitraturia is that A greater than normal concentration of citrate(3-) in the urine.

The definition of the Scissor gait is that A type of spastic paraparetic gait in which the muscle tone in the adductors is marked. It is characterized by hypertonia and flexion in the legs, hips and pelvis accompanied by extreme adduction leading to the knees and thighs hitting, or sometimes even crossing, in a scissors-like movement. The opposing muscles (abductors) become comparatively weak from lack of use.
The definition of the Medullary nephrocalcinosis is that The deposition of calcium salts in the parenchyma of the renal medulla (innermost part of the kidney).

The definition of the Cortical nephrocalcinosis is that The deposition of calcium salts in the parenchyma of the renal cortex (the outer portion of the kidney between the renal capsule and the renal medulla).

The definition of the Pure red cell aplasia is that A type of anemia resulting from suppression of erythropoiesis with little or no abnormality of leukocyte or platelet production. Erythroblasts are virtually absent in bone marrow; however, leukocyte and platelet production show little or no reduction.
The definition of the Premature pubarche is that The onset of growth of pubic hair at an earlier age than normal.
The definition of the Premature adrenarche is that Onset of adrenarche at an earlier age than usual.
The definition of the Notched primary central incisor is that The presence of a V-shaped indentation (notch) in the primary central incisor.
The definition of the Duodenal atrophy is that Wasting or decrease in size of all or part of the duodenum.
The definition of the Abnormal blood gas level is that An abnormality of the partial pressure of oxygen or carbon dioxide in the arterial blood.
The definition of the Hypercapnia is that Abnormally elevated blood carbon dioxide (CO2) level.
The definition of the Hypocapnia is that Abnormally reduced blood carbon dioxide (CO2) level.
The definition of the Hypoxemia is that An abnormally low level of blood oxygen.
The definition of the Hyperoxemia is that An abnormally high level of blood oxygen.
The definition of the Meconium stained amniotic fluid is that Amniotic fluid containing the earliest stools of a mammalian infant.

The definition of the Congenital absence of foreskin is that Congenital lack of the skin of prepuce of penis, that is, of the double-layered fold of skin and mucous membrane that covers the glans penis.
The definition of the Villous hypertrophy of choroid plexus is that Overgrowth of the choroid plexus.

The definition of the Colonic inertia is that The inability of the colon to modify stool to an acceptable consistency and move the stool from the cecum to the rectosigmoid area at least once every three days.
The definition of the Chorioretinitis is that An inflammation of the choroid and retina.
The definition of the Stercoral ulcer is that An ulcer of the colon due to pressure and irritation from retained fecal masses.

The definition of the Optic disc drusen is that Optic disc drusen are acellular, calcified deposits within the optic nerve head. Optic disc drusen are congenital and developmental anomalies of the optic nerve head, representing hyaline-containing bodies that, over time, appear as elevated, lumpy irregularities on the anterior portion of the optic nerve.

The definition of the Excessive femoral anteversion is that An increased degree of femoral version, which is defined as the angular difference between axis of femoral neck and transcondylar axis of the knee. Thus, femoral anteversion is an inward twisting of the femur that causes the knees and feet to turn inward.
The definition of the Prominent calcaneus is that Protruding heel bone, or calcaneus.
The definition of the aplasia/Hypoplasia of the cerebral white matter is that Absence or underdevelopment of the cerebral white matter.
The definition of the Cerebral white matter hypoplasia is that Underdevelopment of the cerebral white matter.
The definition of the Episodic fatigue is that Intermittent and recurrent bouts of a subjective feeling of tiredness characterized by a lack of energy and motivation.
The definition of the Chronic fatigue is that Subjective feeling of tiredness characterized by a lack of energy and motivation that persists for six months or longer.
The definition of the Abnormal social behavior is that An abnormality of actions or reactions of a person taking place during interactions with others. []
The definition of the Delayed social development is that A failure to meet one or more age-related milestones of social behavior. []
The definition of the Ventral shortening of foreskin is that Reduction in length of the ventral (lower) skin of prepuce of penis.
The definition of the Nonocclusive coronary artery disease is that Coronary disease that has not progressed to the point of causing significant occlusion (blockage) of the coronary arteries.
The definition of the Abnormal gallbladder morphology is that A structural anomaly of the gallbladder.
The definition of the Abnormal gallbladder physiology is that A functional anomaly of the gallbladder.
The definition of the Abnormal biliary tract physiology is that A functional abnormality of the biliary tree.
The definition of the Abnormal biliary tract morphology is that A structural abnormality of the biliary tree.

The definition of the Sphincter of Oddi dyskinesia is that Reduced motility through the sphincter of Oddi, resulting in impedance of bile and pancreatic juice flow from the common bile duct into the duodenum.
The definition of the Gallbladder dyskinesia is that Reduced motility of the gallbladder with reduced emptying fraction.
The definition of the Abnormality of brain morphology is that A structural abnormality of the brain, which has as its parts the forebrain, midbrain, and hindbrain.
The definition of the Brain atrophy is that Atrophy (wasting, decrease in size of cells or tissue) affecting the cerebrum.

The definition of the Low CSF 5-methyltetrahydrofolate is that A reduced concentration of 5-methyltetrahydrofolate(2-) in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF). 5-methyltetrahydrofolate is the active folate metabolite.
The definition of the Abnormal myelination is that Any anomaly in the process by which myelin sheaths are formed and maintained around neurons.
The definition of the Delayed myelination is that Delayed myelination.
The definition of the Sacroiliac joint synovitis is that Inflammation of the synovial membrane of the sacroiliac joint.

The definition of the Chronic constipation is that Constipation for longer than three months with fewer than 3 bowel movements per week, straining, lumpy or hard stools, and a sensation of anorectal obstruction or incomplete defecation.
The definition of the Acute constipation is that Constipation of sudden onset and lasting for less than three months.

The definition of the Restless legs is that A persistent belief that a person is infested with living or non-living pathogens, such as parasites, insects, or bugs, when no such infestation is present. []
The definition of the Bilateral wrist flexion contracture is that A chronic loss of wrist joint motion on the right and left sides.
The definition of the Unilateral wrist flexion contracture is that A chronic loss of wrist joint motion on one side only.

The definition of the Medial calcification of medium-sized arteries is that Calcification, that is, pathological deposition of calcium salts in the tunica media of medium-sized (muscular or distributive) arteries.
The definition of the Medial calcification of small arteries is that Calcification, that is, pathological deposition of calcium salts in the tunica media of small arteries.
The definition of the Hypnic headache is that A headache disorder that occurs exclusively at night, waking the affected individual from sleep.
The definition of the Dysmorphic inferior cerebellar vermis is that A structural anomaly of the inferior portion of the vermis of cerebellum.
The definition of the Bacteriuria is that The presence of bacteria in the urine.
The definition of the Chin myoclonus is that Involuntary and irregular twitches of the chin.
The definition of the Elevated transferrin saturation is that An above normal level of saturation of serum transferrin with iron.
The definition of the Decreased transferrin saturation is that A below normal level of saturation of serum transferrin with iron.
The definition of the Elevated hepatic iron concentration is that An increased level of iron in liver tissues.

The definition of the Chronic respiratory acidosis is that Longstanding impairment in ventilation such that the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) is elevated above the upper limit of the reference range (more than 45 mm Hg), with a normal or near-normal pH secondary to renal compensation and an elevated serum bicarbonate levels (more than30 mEq/L).

The definition of the Acute respiratory acidosis is that Sudden onset of impairment in ventilation such that the removal of carbon dioxide by the respiratory system is less than the production of carbon dioxide in the tissues, leading to an elevation of the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) above the normal limits (more than 45 mm Hg) with an accompanying acidemia (pH less than 7.35).
The definition of the Chronic acidosis is that Longstanding abnormal acid accumulation or depletion of base.
The definition of the Infantile spasms is that Infantile spasms represent a subset of epileptic spasms". Infantile Spasms are epileptic spasms starting in the first year of life (infancy)."

The definition of the Setting-sun eye phenomenon is that An ophthalmologic sign in young children resulting from upward-gaze paresis. In this condition, the eyes appear driven downward, the sclera may be seen between the upper eyelid and the iris, and part of the lower pupil may be covered by the lower eyelid.
The definition of the Thick vermilion border is that Increased width of the skin of vermilion border region of upper lip.
The definition of the Eclabion is that A turning outward of the lip or lips, that is, eversion of the lips.
The definition of the Tongue atrophy is that Wasting of the tongue.
The definition of the Carotid artery occlusion is that Complete obstruction of a carotid artery.

The definition of the Specific antibody deficiency is that The presence of normal overall immunoglobulin levels with deficiency of specific immunoglobulins directed against a specific antigen or microorganism.
The definition of the Specific pneumococcal antibody deficiency is that The presence of normal overall immunoglobulin levels with deficiency of specific immunoglobulins directed against pneumococci.

The definition of the Vocal tremor is that A wavering, unsteady voice that reflects involuntary and approximately sinusoidal oscillation of motor unit firings of laryngeal muscles. Vocal tremor results in low frequency modulations of voice frequency or amplitude and intermittent voice instability.
The definition of the Temporomandibular joint ankylosis is that Bony fusion of the mandibular condyle to the base of the skull, resulting in limitation of jaw opening.

The definition of the Temporomandibular joint crepitus is that Noises from the temporomandibular joint during mandibular movement (e.g., chewing). Temporomandibular joint crepitus is often described as a clicking, popping, grating sound.
The definition of the Abnormality of cerebral veins is that An anomaly of cerebral veins.

The definition of the Cerebral venous angioma is that A congenital malformation of veins which drain normal brain characterized by a caput medusae or an umbrellalike convergence of multiple venules on a single, or occasionally multiple, enlarged parenchymal or medullary vein, like the trunk of a tree or the shank of an umbrella. This dilated terminal vein penetrates the cortex to drain either (a) superficially to cortical veins or sinuses, (b) deeply to subependymal veins of the lateral ventricle and then into the galenic system, (c) to the fourth ventricle and then to the pontomesencephalic vein, or (d) to the precentral cerebellar vein and into the galenic system.
The definition of the Frontal venous angioma is that A venous angioma of the frontal lobe of the brain.

The definition of the Abnormal dense granules is that Defective structure, size or content of dense granules, platelet organelles that contain granules proaggregatory factors such as adenosine diphosphate (ADP), adenosine triphosphate (ATP), ionized calcium, histamine and serotonin.

The definition of the Abnormal surface-connected open canalicular system is that An anomaly of the invaginations of the surface membrane that form the open canalicular system (OCS). The OCS serve as the pathway for transport of substances into the cells and as conduits for the discharge of alpha granule products secreted during the platelet release reaction.
The definition of the Myelitis is that Inflammation of the spinal cord.
The definition of the Cerebellopontine angle arachnoid cyst is that An arachnoid cyst located at the margin of the cerebellum and pons.
The definition of the Intraventricular arachnoid cyst is that An arachnoid cyst located within the ventricular system.

The definition of the Suprasellar arachnoid cyst is that An arachnoid cyst that progressively enlarges from an abnormality in the membrane of Liliequist or in the interpeduncular cistern, and typically, expands from the prepontine space, displacing the floor of the third ventricle upwards, the pituitary stalk and optic chiasm upwards and forwards, and the mammillary bodies upwards and backwards.
The definition of the Panniculitis is that Inflammation of adipose tissue.
The definition of the Abnormal dense tubular system is that An anomaly of the intracellular membrane complexes known as the dense tubular system.
The definition of the Cerebral artery stenosis is that Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of a cerebral artery.
The definition of the Middle cerebral artery stenosis is that Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the middle cerebral artery.
The definition of the Anterior cerebral artery stenosis is that Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the anterior cerebral artery.
The definition of the Posterior cerebral artery stenosis is that Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the posterior cerebral artery.
The definition of the Reduced maximal inspiratory pressure is that A decrease in the maximum amount of negative pressure a person can generate during an inhalation.
The definition of the Reduced maximal expiratory pressure is that A decrease in the maximum amount of pressure of expired air achieved by a person after a full inspiration.
The definition of the Nuchal cord is that A complication of pregnancy and delivery in which the umbilical cord wraps around the fetal neck once or multiple times.

The definition of the Descending aortic dissection is that A separation of the layers within the wall of the descending aorta. Tears in the intimal layer result in the propagation of dissection (proximally or distally) secondary to blood entering the intima-media space.
The definition of the Verrucous papule is that A wartlike (with multiple small elevated projections) papule.
The definition of the Abnormality of the brainstem white matter is that An anomaly of the white matter of brainstem.

The definition of the Abnormality of the internal capsule is that An anomaly of the internal capsule, which is an area of white matter in the brain that separates the caudate nucleus and the thalamus from the putamen and the globus pallidus.
The definition of the Abnormality of the pituitary gland is that An anomaly of the pituitary gland.
The definition of the Abnormal size of pituitary gland is that A deviation from the normal size of the pituitary gland.
The definition of the Enlarged pituitary gland is that An abnormally increased size of the pituitary gland.
The definition of the Small pituitary gland is that An abnormally decreased size of the pituitary gland.
The definition of the Weakness of orbicularis oculi muscle is that Reduced strength of the orbicularis oculi, the circumorbital muscle in the face that closes the eyelid.
The definition of the Metamorphopsia is that A visual anomaly in which images appear distorted. A grid of straight lines appears wavy and parts of the grid may appear blank.

The definition of the Reduced thyroxin-binding globulin is that An abnormally decreased amount of thyroxin-binding globulin (TBG) in blood. TBG is responsible for carrying the thyroid hormones thyroxine (T4) and 3,5,3'-triiodothyronine (T3) in the bloodstream.
The definition of the Extra-axial cerebrospinal fluid accumulation is that An increased amount of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) in the subarachnoid space.
The definition of the Temporal optic disc pallor is that A pale yellow discoloration of the temporal (lateral) portion of the optic disc.
The definition of the Diffuse optic disc pallor is that A pale yellow discoloration of the entire optic disc.
The definition of the Upper limb pain is that An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the arm.
The definition of the Lower limb pain is that An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the leg.
The definition of the Hip flexor weakness is that Reduced ability to flex the femur, that is, to pull the knee upward.
The definition of the Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia is that An extreme form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by absence of flow from the right ventricle to the pulmonary arteries.
The definition of the Reduced catalase activity is that An abnormally decreased amount of catalase level.
The definition of the Abnormality of circle of Willis is that An anomaly of the circle of Willis, also known as the cerebral arterial circle.
The definition of the Hypoplastic posterior communicating artery is that A developmental anomnaly characterized by underdevelopment of the posterior communicating artery.

The definition of the Perivascular spaces is that Increased dimensions of the Virchow-Robin spaces (also known as perivascular spaces), which surround the walls of vessels as they course from the subarachnoid space through the brain parenchyma. Perivascular spaces are commonly microscopic, and not visible on conventional neuroimaging. This term refers to an increase of size of these spaces such that they are visible on neuroimaging (usually magnetic resonance imaging). The dilatations are regular cavities that always contain a patent artery.
The definition of the Optic nerve aplasia is that Congenital absence of the optic nerve.

The definition of the Spider hemangioma is that A form of telangiectasis characterized by a central elevated red dot the size of a pinhead, representing an arteriole, with numerous small blood vessels that radiate out thereby resembling the legs of a spider. Characteristically, compression of the central arteriole causes the entire lesion to blanch, and the lesion quickly refills once the compression is released.

The definition of the Oral aversion is that Reluctance or refusal of a child to be breastfed or eat, manifested as gagging, vomiting, turning head away from food, or avoidance of sensation in or around the mouth (i.e. toothbrushing or face-washing).
The definition of the Abnormal platelet shape is that A deviation from the normal discoid platelet shape.
The definition of the Abnormal alpha granule distribution is that An anomalous location and arrangement of platelet alpha granules.
The definition of the Absence of alpha granules is that A lack of platelet alpha granules. This typically results in the grey appearance of platelets in giemsa stained blood smears.

The definition of the Abnormal alpha granule content is that A deviation from the normal contents of the platelet alpha granules, which normally contain hemostatic proteins such as fibrinogen, von Willebrand factor, and growth factors such as platelet-derived growth factor.
The definition of the Abnormal number of alpha granules is that A deviation from the normal count of alpha granules per thrombocyte.

The definition of the Abnormal dense granule content is that A deviation from the normal contents of the platelet alpha granules, which normally contain adenosine triphosphate (ATP), adenosine diphosphate (ADP), serotonin, calcium, and pyrophosphate, which are secreted when platelets are activated.
The definition of the Abnormal number of dense granules is that A deviation from the normal count of dense granules per thrombocyte.
The definition of the Pain is that An unpleasant sensory and emotional experience associated with actual or potential tissue damage, or described in terms of such damage.
The definition of the Chronic pain is that Persistent pain, usually defined as pain that has lasted longer than 3 to 6 months.
The definition of the Allodynia is that Pain due to a stimulus that does not normally provoke pain.

The definition of the Dysesthesia is that Painful sensations elicited by a nonpainful cutaneous stimulus such as a light touch or gentle stroking over affected areas of the body. Sometimes referred to as hyperpathia or hyperalgesia. Often perceived as an intense burning, dyesthesias may outlast the stimulus by several seconds.

The definition of the Abnormal synaptic transmission is that An anomaly in the communication from a neuron to a target across a synapse. This is a four step process, comprising (i) synthesis and storage of neurotransmitters; (ii) neurotransmitter release; (iii) activation of postsynaptic receptors by the neurotransmitter; and (iv) inactivation of the neurotransmitter. Thus, this term is defined as an anomaly of neurotransmitter metabolic process.
The definition of the Maternal anticardiolipin antibody positive is that The presence of circulating autoantibodies to anticardiolipin in the mother.

The definition of the Food intolerance is that A detrimental reaction to a food, beverage, food additive, or compound found in foods that produces symptoms in one or more body organs and systems that is not mediated by an immune reaction.
The definition of the Gluten intolerance is that A detrimental reaction to the presence of gluten in food, which may include abdominal pain, fatigue, headaches and paresthesia, or celiac disease.
The definition of the Non-Hodgkin lymphoma is that A type of lymphoma characterized microscopically by the absence of multinucleated Reed-Sternberg cells.
The definition of the Axillary epidermoid cyst is that An epidermoid cyst in the armpit.
The definition of the Cephalohematoma is that Hemorrhage between the skull and periosteum of a newborn resulting from rupture of blood vessels that cross the periosteum.
The definition of the Onychauxis is that Thickened nails without deformity.
The definition of the Hemosiderinuria is that The presence of hemosiderin in the urine.
The definition of the Elevated aldolase level is that Concentration of fructose 1,6-bisphosphate aldolase in the blood circulation above the upper limit of normal.
The definition of the Reduced aldolase level is that Concentration of fructose 1,6-bisphosphate aldolase in the blood circulation below the lower limit of normal.
The definition of the Skewed maternal X inactivation is that A deviation from equal (50%) inactivation of each parental X chromosome in maternal cells.
The definition of the Abnormal involuntary eye movements is that Anomalous movements of the eyes that occur without the subject wanting them to happen.
The definition of the Skeletal muscle fatty infiltration is that Muscle fibers degeneration resulting in fatty replacement of skeletal muscle fibers
The definition of the Conjunctival lipoma is that A lipoma (a benign tumor composed of adipose tissue) located in the conjunctiva.
The definition of the Colonic varices is that The presence of varices (enlarged and convoluted blood vessels) in the colon.
The definition of the Absent neutrophil specific granules is that Lack of specific granules in neutrophils.

The definition of the Increased neutrophil nuclear projections is that Presence of an elevated number of projections from nuclei of neutrophils. These projections can have the shape of hooks, tags, or clubs.
The definition of the Hypoplastic thumbnail is that A thumbnail that is diminished in length and width, i.e., underdeveloped thumb nail.
The definition of the Absent thumbnail is that Absence of thumb nail.
The definition of the Absent nail of hallux is that Absent nail of big toe.
The definition of the Hyperbetaalaninemia is that Increased concentration of beta-alanine in the blood.

The definition of the EEG with centrotemporal focal spike waves is that EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the centrotemporal region of the brain (also known as the central sulcus), i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.
The definition of the Abnormal T3/T4 ratio is that A ratio of serum triiodothyronine (T3) to thyroxine (T4) in the blood that deviates from normal.
The definition of the Increased T3/T4 ratio is that A ratio of serum triiodothyronine (T3) to thyroxine (T4) in the blood that is higher than normal.
The definition of the Decreased T3/T4 ratio is that A ratio of serum triiodothyronine (T3) to thyroxine (T4) in the blood that is lower than normal.
The definition of the Unicuspid aortic valve is that The presence of an aortic valve with one instead of the normal three cusps (flaps).

The definition of the Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in hand is that Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the hand, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.

The definition of the Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in foot is that Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the foot, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.

The definition of the Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in tibia is that Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the tibia, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.

The definition of the Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in fibula is that Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the fibula, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.

The definition of the Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in radius is that Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the radius, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.

The definition of the Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in ulna is that Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the ulna, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.
The definition of the Lower eyelid edema is that Edema in the region of the Lower eyelid.
The definition of the Delayed menarche is that First period after the age of 15 years.
The definition of the Synovial sarcoma is that A type of mesenchymal tissue cell tumor that exhibits epithelial differentiation, which most frequently arises in the extremities.

The definition of the Ureter fissus is that A partial duplication of the ureter where the duplicated ureters fuse to a single ureter before their insertion into the bladder. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_ewuehl]
The definition of the Ureter duplex is that A complete duplication of the ureter, where the duplicated ureters have separate insertions into the bladder. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_fschaefer]

The definition of the Global proximal tubulopathy is that A type of proximal renal tubulopathy characterized by resorption defects leading to glycosuria, aminoaciduria, tubular proteinuria, renal hypophosphatemia, and urate tubular hyporeabsorption with bicarbonate loss and resulting acidosis.

The definition of the Mesangial proliferation is that Increased numbers of mesangial cells per glomerulus, defined as more than 3 nuclei fully surrounded by matrix in one or more mesangial areas, not including perihilar region, on a standard 3-micron-thick tissue section, best evaluated on periodic acid-Schiff (PAS) stain. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_fschaefer, https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2356-950X, PMID:32866505]
The definition of the Abnormality of the nephron is that A structural anomaly of the nephron. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_fschaefer]
The definition of the C3 nephropathy is that The presence of complement 3 deposits in the glomerulus. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_ewuehl]

The definition of the Thin glomerular basement membrane is that Decreased thickness of the glomerular basement membrane (GBM), measured from endothelial to visceral epithelial plasma membrane and mainly attributable to a decrease in thickness of the lamina densa, generally to an overall thickness more than 2 standard deviations less than that of the normal mean GBM thickness for health age- and sex matched individuals. May be focal or diffuse, although the term thin GBMs generally implies thinning of over 50% of GBMs.

The definition of the Membranous nephropathy is that A type of glomerulonephropathy characterized by thickening of the basement membrane and deposition of immune complexes in the subepithelial space. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_fschaefer]

The definition of the Minimal change glomerulonephritis is that The presence of minimal changes visible by light microscopy but flattened and fused podocyte foot processes on electron microscopy in a person with nephrotic range proteinuria. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_fschaefer]
The definition of the Calcium phosphate nephrolithiasis is that The presence of calcium- and phosphate-containing calculi (stones) in the kidneys.
The definition of the Solitary renal cyst is that An isolated cyst of the kidney. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_ewuehl]
The definition of the Bilateral renal dysplasia is that A bilateral form of developmental dysplasia of the kidney.
The definition of the Unilateral renal hypoplasia is that One sided hypoplasia of the kidney. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_fschaefer]
The definition of the Bilateral renal hypoplasia is that Two sided hypoplasia of the kidney. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_fschaefer]
The definition of the Renal atrophy is that Atrophy of the kidney.
The definition of the Bilateral renal atrophy is that A two-sided form of atrophy of the kidney.
The definition of the Macroscopic hematuria is that Hematuria that is visible upon inspection of the urine.
