The definition of the Wind-swept deformity of the knees is that The appearance of abnormal valgus deformity in one knee in association with varus deformity in the other.
The definition of the Scleritis is that Inflammation of the sclera.
The definition of the Inflammatory abnormality of the eye is that Inflammation of the eye, parts of the eye or the periorbital region.
The definition of the Episcleritis is that Inflammation of the episclera, a thin layer of tissue covering the white part (sclera) of the eye.
The definition of the Abnormality of the fascia is that An abnormality of fascia.
The definition of the Fasciitis is that Inflammation of fascia, the tissue under the skin and over the muscle.
The definition of the Abnormality of the supraorbital ridges is that An anomaly of the supraorbital portion of the frontal bones.
The definition of the Periorbital edema is that Edema affecting the region situated around the orbit of the eye.
The definition of the Palpebral edema is that Edema in the region of the eyelids.
The definition of the Femoral hernia is that A hernia which occurs just below the inguinal ligament, where abdominal contents pass through a naturally occurring weakness called the femoral canal.
The definition of the Abnormal localization of kidney is that An abnormal site of the kidney.
The definition of the Cognitive impairment is that Abnormal cognition is characterized by deficits in thinking, reasoning, or remembering. []
The definition of the Neoplasm of the heart is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the heart.
The definition of the Arterial stenosis is that Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of an artery.
The definition of the Carotid artery stenosis is that Narrowing of the carotid arteries.
The definition of the Abnormality of forebrain morphology is that An abnormality of the forebrain, which has as its parts the telencephalon, diencephalon, lateral ventricles and third ventricle.
The definition of the Exstrophy is that Eversion of a hollow organ and exposure, inside out, and protruded through the abdominal wall.
The definition of the Tendon rupture is that Breakage (tear) of a tendon.
The definition of the Hemihypertrophy of lower limb is that Overgrowth of only one leg.
The definition of the Hemihypertrophy of upper limb is that Overgrowth of only one arm.
The definition of the Asymmetric growth is that A growth pattern that displays an abnormal difference between the left and the right side.
The definition of the Hemiatrophy is that Undergrowth of the limbs that affects only one side.
The definition of the Hemiatrophy of lower limb is that Unilateral atrophy (reduction in size) of a leg.
The definition of the Hemiatrophy of upper limb is that Unilateral atrophy (reduction in size) of an arm.
The definition of the Lower limb asymmetry is that A difference in length or diameter between the left and right leg.
The definition of the Upper limb asymmetry is that Difference in length or size between the right and left arm.
The definition of the Diplomyelia is that Duplication of the spinal cord.

The definition of the Diastematomyelia is that Coexistence of two hemicords, at variable levels, causing splaying of the posterior vertebral elements. Results in neurological deficits in lower limb or perineum.
The definition of the Triplomyelia is that Triplication of the spinal cord - extremely rare.
The definition of the Hydromyelia is that Dilation of central canal from incomplete fusion of the posterior columns or persistence of the primitive large canal of the embryo.
The definition of the Amyelia is that Congenital absence of the spinal cord.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the endocrine system is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the endocrine system.
The definition of the Abnormal vertebral ossification is that An abnormality of the formation and mineralization of one or more vertebrae.

The definition of the Carcinoid is that A tumor formed from the endocrine (argentaffin) cells of the mucosal lining of a variety of organs including the stomach and intestine. These cells are from neuroectodermal origin.
The definition of the Cardiac diverticulum is that A cardiac diverticulum is a rare congenital malformation which is either fibrous or muscular.
The definition of the Fibrous cardiac diverticulum is that A fibrous cardiac diverticulum refers to an aneurysm and usually appears as an isolated congenital anomaly.
The definition of the Biliary tract neoplasm is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the biliary system.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the gallbladder is that The presence of a neoplasm of the gallbladder.
The definition of the Amaurosis fugax is that A transient visual disturbance that is typically caused by a circulatory, ocular or neurological underlying condition.
The definition of the Urinary bladder inflammation is that Inflammation of the urinary bladder.
The definition of the Lipoatrophy is that Localized loss of fat tissue.

The definition of the Mucosal telangiectasiae is that Telangiectasia of the mucosa, the mucous membranes which are involved in absorption and secretion that line cavities that are exposed to the external environment and internal organs.

The definition of the Barrett esophagus is that An abnormal change (metaplasia) in the cells of the inferior portion of the esophagus. The normal squamous epithelium lining of the esophagus is replaced by metaplastic columnar epithelium. Columnar epithelium refers to a cell type that is typically found in more distal parts of the gastrointestinal system.
The definition of the Megacalicosis is that An abnormal enlargement of the renal calices, the system of ducts of the kidney that collect urine.

The definition of the Nasal polyposis is that Polypoidal masses arising mainly from the mucous membranes of the nose and paranasal sinuses. They are freely movable and nontender overgrowths of the mucosa that frequently accompany allergic rhinitis.
The definition of the Corneal perforation is that A rupture of the cornea through which a portion of the iris protrudes. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:DDD_ncarter]
The definition of the Endocarditis is that An inflammation of the endocardium, the inner layer of the heart, which usually involves the heart valves.
The definition of the Teleangiectasia of the skin is that Presence of small, permanently dilated blood vessels near the surface of the skin, visible as small focal red lesions.
The definition of the Aseptic leukocyturia is that Patients who routinely have greater than 20 leukocytes per microliter, but have abacterial urine, are said to have sterile pyuria.
The definition of the Paraphimosis is that The foreskin becomes trapped behind the glans penis, and cannot be pulled back to its normal flaccid position covering the glans penis.
The definition of the Urogenital fistula is that The presence of a fistula affecting the genitourinary system.
The definition of the Rectal fistula is that The presence of a fistula affecting the rectum.
The definition of the Peritoneal abscess is that The presence of an abscess of the peritoneum.

The definition of the Esophageal web is that Thin (2-3mm) membranes of normal esophageal tissue consisting of mucosa and submucosa that can be congenital or acquired. Congenital webs commonly appear in the middle and inferior third of the esophagus, and they are more likely to be circumferential with a central or eccentric orifice. Acquired webs are much more common than congenital webs and typically appear in the cervical area (postcricoid). Clinical symptoms of this condition are selective (solid more than liquids) dysphagia, thoracic pain, nasopharyngeal reflux, aspiration, perforation and food impaction (the last two are very rare).

The definition of the Camptocormia is that An abnormal forward-flexed posture e.g. forward flexion of the spine, which is noticeable when standing or walking but disappears when lying down. It is becoming an increasingly recognized feature of Parkinson's disease and dystonic disorders.
The definition of the Absent nares is that The nostrils (the paired channels of the nose) are not present.
The definition of the Pulmonary edema is that Fluid accumulation in the lungs.
The definition of the Diphallia is that Two penile structures, separated from the tip to the base of the shaft.
The definition of the Penoscrotal transposition is that A partial or complete positional exchange between the penis and the scrotum, with positioning of the scrotum superior to the penis.

The definition of the Eclampsia is that An acute and life-threatening complication of pregnancy, which is characterized by the appearance of tonic-clonic seizures, usually in a patient who had developed pre-eclampsia. Eclampsia includes seizures and coma that happen during pregnancy but are not due to preexisting or organic brain disorders.
The definition of the Preeclampsia is that Pregnancy-induced hypertension in association with significant amounts of protein in the urine.
The definition of the Toxemia of pregnancy is that Pregnancy-induced toxic reactions of the mother that can be as harmless as slight Maternal hypertension or as life threatening as Eclampsia.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the lip is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the lip.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the respiratory system is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the respiratory system.

The definition of the Maternal hyperphenylalaninemia is that A medical history of exposure during the fetal period to hyperphenylalaninemia because the mother had phenylketonuria with inadequate control during pregnancy.

The definition of the Multiple glomerular cysts is that The presence of many cysts in the glomerulus of the kidney related to dilatation of the Bowman's capsule. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:Eurenomics_fschaefer, PMID:20091054, PMID:20367310]
The definition of the Odontogenic neoplasm is that Neoplasm involving odontogenic cells, an odontogenic tumor.
The definition of the Myositis is that Chronic muscle inflammation accompanied by muscle weakness. [PMID:19349710]
The definition of the Ovarian neoplasm is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the ovary.
The definition of the Testicular teratoma is that The presence of a teratoma of the testis.
The definition of the Testicular seminoma is that The presence of a seminoma, an undifferentiated germ cell tumor of the testis.
The definition of the Leydig cell neoplasia is that The presence of a neoplasm of the testis with origin in a Leydig cell.
The definition of the Sertoli cell neoplasm is that The presence of a neoplasm of the testis with origin in a Sertoli cell.
The definition of the Germinoma is that A type of undifferentiated germ cell tumor that may be benign or malignant.
The definition of the Dysgerminoma is that The presence of a dysgerminoma, i.e., an undifferentiated germ cell tumor of the ovary.
The definition of the Maternal seizures is that A seizure during pregnancy. [PMID:25746572]

The definition of the Displacement of the external urethral meatus is that A displacement of the external urethral orifice from its normal position (in males normally placed at the tip of glans penis, in females normally placed about 2.5 cm behind the glans clitoridis and immediately in front of that of the vagina).
The definition of the Esophageal diverticulum is that The presence of a diverticulum of the esophagus.
The definition of the Midline facial cleft is that A congenital malformation with a cleft (gap or opening) in the midline of the face.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the adrenal gland is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the adrenal gland.

The definition of the Pulmonary sequestration is that The presence of a piece lung tissue which is not attached to the pulmonary blood supply and does not communicate with the other lung tissue (not connected to the standard bronchial airways and not performing a function in respiration).
The definition of the Esophagitis is that Inflammation of the esophagus.
The definition of the Carotid paraganglioma is that A paraganglioma (a neuroendocrine neoplasm) originating in a carotid artery.
The definition of the Laryngeal cyst is that Presence of a cyst (sac-like structure) located in the larynx.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the adrenal cortex is that The presence of a neoplasm of the adrenal cortex.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the adrenal medulla is that The presence of a neoplasm of the adrenal medulla.
The definition of the Abnormality of nail color is that An anomaly of the color of the nail.
The definition of the Melanonychia is that Brown or black discoloration of the nails.
The definition of the Cystocele is that Anterior vaginal wall prolapse with bulging of the bladder into the vagina.
The definition of the Thyroiditis is that Inflammation of the thyroid gland.

The definition of the Graves disease is that An autoimmune disease where the thyroid is overactive, producing an excessive amount of thyroid hormones (a serious metabolic imbalance known as hyperthyroidism and thyrotoxicosis). This is caused by autoantibodies to the TSH-receptor (TSHR-Ab) that activate that TSH-receptor (TSHR), thereby stimulating thyroid hormone synthesis and secretion, and thyroid growth (causing a diffusely enlarged goiter). The resulting state of hyperthyroidism can cause a dramatic constellation of neuropsychological and physical signs and symptoms, which can severely compromise the patients.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the tongue is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the tongue.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the oral cavity is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the oral cavity.
The definition of the Vaginal neoplasm is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the vagina.

The definition of the Type I diabetes mellitus is that A chronic condition in which the pancreas produces little or no insulin. Type I diabetes mellitus is manifested by the sudden onset of severe hyperglycemia with rapid progression to diabetic ketoacidosis unless treated with insulin.
The definition of the Optic neuritis is that Inflammation of the optic nerve.
The definition of the Retrobulbar optic neuritis is that Optic neuritis that occurs in the section of the optic nerve located behind the eyeball.
The definition of the Celosomia is that Congenital protrusion of the abdominal or thoracic viscera, usually with a defect of the sternum and ribs as well as of the abdominal walls.
The definition of the Dyskinesia is that A movement disorder which consists of effects including diminished voluntary movements and the presence of involuntary movements.

The definition of the Trigeminal neuralgia is that A neuropathic disorder characterized by episodes of intense pain in the face, originating from the trigeminal nerve. One, two, or all three branches of the nerve may be affected.
The definition of the Chondritis is that Inflammation of cartilage.

The definition of the Synotia is that A congenital malformation characterized by the union or approximation of the ears in front of the neck, often accompanied by the absence or defective development of the lower jaw.

The definition of the Angioedema is that Rapid swelling (edema) of the dermis, subcutaneous tissue, mucosa and submucosal tissues of the skin of the face, normally around the mouth, and the mucosa of the mouth and/or throat, as well as the tongue during a period of minutes to several hours. The swelling can also occur elsewhere, typically in the hands. Angioedema is similar to urticaria, but the swelling is subcutaneous rather than on the epidermis.
The definition of the Intestinal duplication is that A developmental disorder in which there is a duplication the entire intestine or of a portion of the intestine.
The definition of the Abnormal pigmentation of the oral mucosa is that An abnormality of the pigmentation of the mucosa of the mouth.
The definition of the Abnormal trabecular bone morphology is that Abnormal structure or form of trabecular bone.
The definition of the Vaginal hernia is that The presence of a hernia of the vagina.
The definition of the Vaginal varicocele is that Varicosity of veins in the vulval region.
The definition of the Premature skin wrinkling is that The presence of an increased degree of wrinkling (irregular folds and indentations) of the skin as compared with age-related norms.
The definition of the Esophageal duplication is that A developmental disorder in which there is a duplication of a portion of the muscle and submucosa of the esophagus without epithelial duplication.

The definition of the Tracheal atresia is that A congenital absence or considerable underdevelopment of the trachea such that communication between the larynx proximally and the alveoli of the lungs distally is lacking.
The definition of the Salivary gland neoplasm is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of a salivary gland.

The definition of the Abnormality of Sharpey fibers is that An abnormality of Sharpey's fibers (bone fibers, or perforating fibers), which are a matrix of connective tissue consisting of bundles of strong collagenous fibres connecting periosteum to bone.
The definition of the Polyotia is that The presence of an extra auricle on one or both sides of the head.
The definition of the Increased corneal curvature is that An increase in the degree of curvature of the cornea compared to normal. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:DDD_ncarter]
The definition of the Iridodonesis is that Tremulousness of the iris on movement of the eye, occurring in subluxation of the lens.
The definition of the Tibial torsion is that Twisted position of the tibia (shin bone) associated with pathological rotation of the leg.
The definition of the Lipedema is that Excess deposit and expansion of adipose tissue in an unusual pattern which cannot be lost through diet and exercise .
The definition of the Neurofibrosarcoma is that A form of malignant cancer of the connective tissue surrounding nerves. Given its origin and behavior, it is classified as a sarcoma.
The definition of the Subcutaneous neurofibromas is that A neurofibroma (benign peripheral nerve sheath tumor) localized in the subcutis (subcutaneous region).
The definition of the Abnormality of the arachnoid mater is that An abnormality of the Arachnoid mater.
The definition of the Abnormality of the pia mater is that An abnormality of the pia mater.
The definition of the Arachnoid cyst is that An extra-parenchymal and intra-arachnoidal collection of fluid with a composition similar to that of cerebrospinal fluid.
The definition of the Cortical visual impairment is that A form of loss of vision caused by damage to the visual cortex rather than a defect in the eye.
The definition of the Abnormality of the glial cells is that An abnormality of the glia cell.

The definition of the Abnormality of the oligodendroglia is that One of the three types of glia cells that, with the nerve cells, compose the central nervous system and are characterized by sheetlike processes that wrap around individual axons to form the myelin sheath of nerve fibers.
The definition of the Abnormality of the astrocytes is that An abnormality of astrocytes.
The definition of the Abnormality of the microglia is that An abnormality of the microglial cells. They are also known as brain-resident macrophages or Hortega cells.
The definition of the Abnormality of the thoracic spine is that An abnormality of the thoracic vertebral column.
The definition of the Abnormality of the lumbar spine is that Any structural abnormality of the lumbar vertebral column.
The definition of the Self-injurious behavior is that Self-aggression. []
The definition of the Lens coloboma is that A sectoral indentation of the crystalline lens, usually due to zonular weakness or absence.

The definition of the Mediastinal lymphadenopathy is that Swelling of lymph nodes within the mediastinum, the central compartment of the thoracic cavities that contains the heart and the great vessels, the esophagus, and trachea and other structures including lymph nodes.
The definition of the Hypercoagulability is that An abnormality of coagulation associated with an increased risk of thrombosis.
The definition of the Lichenification is that Thickening and hardening of the epidermis seen with exaggeration of normal skin lines.

The definition of the Kaposi's sarcoma is that A systemic disease which can present with cutaneous lesions with or without internal involvement. Tumors are caused by Human herpesvirus 8 (HHV8), also known as Kaposi's sarcoma-associated herpesvirus (KSHV).
The definition of the Histiocytosis is that An excessive number of histiocytes (tissue macrophages).
The definition of the Bronchogenic cyst is that A rare congenital cystic lesion of the lungs in the mediastinum.
The definition of the Transverse facial cleft is that A horizontal cleft of the face, varying from slight widening of the mouth, to a cleft extending to the ear. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:DDD_jhurst]
The definition of the Neoplasm of the parathyroid gland is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the parathyroid gland.
The definition of the Abnormality of the soft palate is that An abnormality of the soft palate.

The definition of the Bulimia is that A form of anomalous eating behavior characterized by binge eating is followed by self-induced vomiting or other compensatory behavior intended to prevent weight gain (purging, fasting or exercising or a combination of these).
The definition of the Vascular neoplasm is that A benign or malignant neoplasm (tumor) originating in the vascular system.
The definition of the Macrodactyly of finger is that A type of Macrodactyly affecting one or several fingers.
The definition of the Macrodactyly of toe is that A type of Macrodactyly affecting one or several toes.
The definition of the Atelectasis is that Collapse of part of a lung associated with absence of inflation (air) of that part.

The definition of the Schizophrenia is that A mental disorder characterized by a disintegration of thought processes and emotional responsiveness. It most commonly manifests as auditory hallucinations, paranoid or bizarre delusions, or disorganized speech and thinking. It is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction. The onset of symptoms typically occurs in young adulthood, with a global lifetime prevalence of about 1%. This term is not a helpful parent term to describe abnormal experiences. []
The definition of the Mania is that A state of abnormally elevated or irritable mood, arousal, and/or energy levels. []
The definition of the Pancreatoblastoma is that A rare pediatric carcinoma of the pancreas.
The definition of the Gangrene is that A serious and potentially life-threatening condition that arises when a considerable mass of body tissue dies (necrosis). [ISBN:9780781770873]
The definition of the Clubbing of fingers is that Terminal broadening of the fingers (distal phalanges of the fingers).
The definition of the Clubbing of toes is that Terminal broadening of the toes (distal phalanges of the toes).
The definition of the Hemobilia is that Bleeding into the biliary tree.

The definition of the Abnormality of the lymphatic system is that An anomaly of the lymphatic system, a network of lymphatic vessels that carry a clear fluid called lymph unidirectionally towards either the right lymphatic duct or the thoracic duct, which in turn drain into the right and left subclavian veins respectively.
The definition of the Abnormality of the tonsils is that An abnormality of the tonsils.

The definition of the Abnormality of the placenta is that An abnormality of the placenta, the organ that connects the developing fetus to the uterine wall to enable nutrient uptake, waste elimination, and gas exchange.

The definition of the Choriocarcinoma is that A malignant, trophoblastic and aggressive cancer, usually of the placenta. It is characterized by early hematogenous spread to the lungs and belongs to the far end of the spectrum of gestational trophoblastic disease (GTD), a subset of germ cell tumors.
The definition of the Hyperostosis is that Excessive growth or abnormal thickening of bone tissue.
The definition of the Dural ectasia is that A widening or ballooning of the dural sac surrounding the spinal cord usually at the lumbosacral level.
The definition of the Recurrent pharyngitis is that An increased susceptibility to pharyngitis as manifested by a history of recurrent pharyngitis.
The definition of the Exostoses is that An exostosis is a benign growth the projects outward from the bone surface. It is capped by cartilage, and arises from a bone that develops from cartilage.

The definition of the Cryoglobulinemia is that Increased level of cryoglobulins in the blood. Cryoglobulins are abnormal immunoglobulins, especially IGG or IGM, that precipitate spontaneously when serum is cooled below 37 degrees Celsius.
The definition of the Urogenital sinus anomaly is that A rare birth defect in women where the urethra and vagina both open into a common channel.
The definition of the Conjunctival hamartoma is that A hamartoma (disordered proliferation of mature tissues) of the conjunctiva.
The definition of the Abnormality of the sacroiliac joint is that An anomaly of the sacroiliac joint, which connects the base of the spine (sacrum) to the ilium (a hip bone).
The definition of the Fused lips is that Lack of separation of the upper and lower lips.
The definition of the Torus palatinus is that A bony protrusion present on the midline of the hard palate.
The definition of the Acantholysis is that The loss of intercellular connections, such as desmosomes, resulting in loss of cohesion between keratinocytes.
The definition of the Abnormally straight spine is that The absence of the normal curvature of the vertebral column.
The definition of the Orchitis is that Testicular inflammation.
The definition of the Toenail dysplasia is that An abnormality of the development of the toenails.
The definition of the Fingernail dysplasia is that An abnormality of the development of the fingernails.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the middle ear is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the middle ear.
The definition of the aplasia/Hypoplasia of the pancreas is that A congenital underdevelopment (aplasia or hypoplasia) of the pancreas.
The definition of the Pancreatic aplasia is that Aplasia of the pancreas.
The definition of the Abnormality of the periungual region is that An abnormality of the region around the nails of the fingers or toes.

The definition of the Periungual fibroma is that Flesh-colored papule in or around the nail bed. Ungual fibromas may be periungual (arising under the proximal nail fold) or subungual (originating under the nail plate).
The definition of the Sepsis is that Systemic inflammatory response to infection.

The definition of the Long fingers is that The middle finger is more than 2 SD above the mean for newborns 27 to 41 weeks EGA or above the 97th centile for children from birth to 16 years of age AND the five digits retain their normal length proportions relative to each other (i.e., it is not the case that the middle finger is the only lengthened digit), or, Fingers that appear disproportionately long compared to the palm of the hand. [PMID:19125433]
The definition of the aplasia/Hypoplasia of the colon is that Congenital absence or underdevelopment of the colon.
The definition of the Halitosis is that Noticeably unpleasant odors exhaled in breathing.
The definition of the Testicular torsion is that Testicular torsion is when the spermatic cord to a testicle twists, cutting off the blood supply. The most common symptom is acute testicular pain.
The definition of the Renovascular hypertension is that The presence of hypertension related to stenosis of the renal artery.
The definition of the Long thorax is that Increased inferior to superior extent of the thorax.
The definition of the Intestinal fistula is that An abnormal connection between the gut and another hollow organ, such as the bladder, urethra, vagina, or other regions of the gastrointestinal tract.
The definition of the Glomerulopathy is that Inflammatory or noninflammatory diseases affecting the glomeruli of the nephron.
The definition of the Urethrocele is that The prolapse of the female urethra into the vagina.

The definition of the Rectocele is that A Rectocele results from a tear in the rectovaginal septum (which is normally a tough, fibrous, sheet-like divider between the rectum and vagina). Rectal tissue bulges through this tear and into the vagina as a hernia. There are two main causes of this tear: childbirth, and hysterectomy.
The definition of the Cheilitis is that Inflammation of the lip.
The definition of the Lymphocytosis is that Increase in the number or proportion of lymphocytes in the blood.
The definition of the Galactorrhea is that Spontaneous flow of milk from the breast, unassociated with childbirth or nursing.
The definition of the Abnormality of vitamin K metabolism is that Vitamin K is a fat-soluble vitamin with a role in promoting the coagulation cascade.
The definition of the Mouches volantes is that Deposits of various size, shape, consistency, refractive index, and motility within the eye's vitreous humour, which is normally transparent.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the small intestine is that The presence of a neoplasm of the small intestine.
The definition of the Neoplasm of the large intestine is that The presence of a neoplasm of the large intestine.

The definition of the Atrophodermia vermiculata is that Symmetrical vermiform facial atrophy that affects mainly the forehead, the chin, the ear lobes and helices. Atrophodermia vermiculata is characterized by erythema and follicular plugs on the cheeks, developing into painless reticular impressions.
The definition of the Recurrent cutaneous abscess formation is that An increased susceptibility to cutaneous abscess formation, as manifested by a medical history of recurrent cutaneous abscesses.
The definition of the aplasia/Hypoplasia of the eyebrow is that Absence or underdevelopment of the eyebrow.
The definition of the Septo-optic dysplasia is that Underdevelopment of the optic nerve and absence of the septum pellucidum.
The definition of the Anaphylactic shock is that An acute hypersensitivity reaction due to exposure to a previously encountered antigen.
The definition of the Neoplasia of the male external genitalia is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the male external genitalia.
The definition of the Abnormal emotion/affect behavior is that Abnormalities in the intensity, frequency, or duration of emotional experiences. []

The definition of the Abnormal fear/anxiety-related behavior is that An abnormal fear-induced behavior includes observable actions. This behavior is characterized by abnormal responses to fear or abnormal fear levels. Examples of such behavior include avoiding fear-inducing situations. []
The definition of the Hypoplastic areola is that Underdevelopment of the areola, the circular area of pigmented skin surrounding the nipple.
The definition of the aplasia of the musculature is that Absence of the musculature.
The definition of the Triceps hypoplasia is that Hypoplasia of the triceps muscle.
The definition of the Poorly ossified vertebrae is that Decreased ossification of the vertebral bodies.
The definition of the Flat sella turcica is that An abnormally flat sella turcica.
The definition of the Celiac artery aneurysm is that Abnormal outpouching or sac-like dilatation in the wall of the celiac artery.
The definition of the Superior mesenteric artery aneurysm is that Abnormal outpouching or sac-like dilatation in the wall of the superior mesenteric artery .
The definition of the Inferior mesenteric artery aneurysm is that Abnormal outpouching or sac-like dilatation in the wall of the inferior mesenteric artery .
The definition of the Vertebral body sclerosis is that Increase in bone density of the vertebral body.
The definition of the Short femoral neck is that An abnormally short femoral neck (which is the process of bone, connecting the femoral head with the femoral shaft).
The definition of the Broad ischia is that Increased width of the ischium, which forms the lower and back part of the hip bone.
The definition of the Duodenal stenosis is that The narrowing or partial blockage of a portion of the duodenum.
The definition of the Palmar telangiectasia is that The presence of telangiectases on the skin of palm of hand.
The definition of the Plantar telangiectasia is that Telangiectases (small dilated blood vessels) located on the skin of sole of foot.
The definition of the Abnormality of the palm is that An abnormality of the palm, that is, of the front of the hand.
The definition of the Abnormality of the plantar skin of foot is that An abnormality of the plantar part of foot, that is of the soles of the feet.
The definition of the Thick hair is that Increased density of hairs, i.e., and elevated number of hairs per unit area.
The definition of the Hemimacroglossia is that Increased length and width of one half of the tounge.
The definition of the Infra-orbital crease is that Skin crease extending from below the inner canthus laterally along the malar process of the maxilla and zygoma. [PMID:19125427]

The definition of the Renal diverticulum is that Cystic, urine-containing intrarenal cavities lined with transitional cell epithelium that communicate through a narrow channel with the collecting system.
The definition of the Nephrogenic rest is that Abnormally persistent clusters of embryonal cells, representing microscopic malformations (dysplasias) of the developing kidney.

The definition of the Congenital mesoblastic nephroma is that Congenital mesoblastic nephroma is a type of kidney tumor that is usually found before birth by ultrasound or within the first 3 months of life. It contains fibroblastic cells (connective tissue cells), and may spread to the other kidney or to nearby tissue.
The definition of the Fibrous hamartoma is that A rare, benign soft tissue tumor that typically occurs within the first two years of life.
The definition of the Chorangioma is that Hamartoma-like growth in the placenta consisting of blood vessels.

The definition of the Compensatory scoliosis is that A scoliosis which is the results of a difference in leg length (which might be due to hemihypertrophy or hemihypotrophy of a leg) and the resulting tilting of the pelvis. If untreated this will lead to the development of scoliosis over time.

The definition of the Lateral venous anomaly is that Persistence of the embryonic dorsal or sciatic vein system that normally should have involuted around the tenth to twelfth week of intrauterine life.
The definition of the Abnormality of globe location is that An abnormality in the placement of the ocular globe (eyeball).
The definition of the Abnormality of globe size is that An abnormality in the size of the ocular globe (eyeball).

The definition of the Abnormality of the ductus choledochus is that An abnormality of the Common bile duct, a tube-like anatomic structure in the human gastrointestinal tract, formed by the union of the Common hepatic duct and the Cystic duct from the gall bladder.
The definition of the Bifid xiphoid process is that A cleft of the xiphoid process of the sternum.
The definition of the Abnormality of the xiphoid process is that An abnormality of the xiphoid process of the sternum.
The definition of the Prominent xiphoid process is that Increased prominence of the xiphoid process of the sternum.
The definition of the Broad xiphoid process is that Increased side-to-side width of the xiphoid process of the sternum.
The definition of the Rectal polyposis is that The presence of multiple rectal hyperplastic/adenomatous polyps.
The definition of the Connective tissue nevi is that Connective tissue nevi are hamartomas in which one or several components of the dermis is altered.

The definition of the Sclerosis of finger phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the fingers. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
The definition of the Sclerosis of the distal phalanx of the thumb is that An elevation of bone density in the distal phalanx of the thumb.
The definition of the Sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb is that An elevation of bone density in the proximal phalanx of the thumb.

The definition of the Sclerosis of distal finger phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more distal phalanges of the fingers. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of middle finger phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more middle phalanges of the fingers. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of proximal finger phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more proximal phalanges of the fingers. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of 2nd finger phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the second finger. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of 3rd finger phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the third finger. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of 4th finger phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the fourth finger. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of 5th finger phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the fifth finger. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
The definition of the Clavicular sclerosis is that An increase in bone density within the clavicle.

The definition of the Sclerosis of toe phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the toes. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
The definition of the Sclerosis of foot bone is that An elevation in bone density in one or more foot bones. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of 2nd toe phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the second toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of 3rd toe phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the third toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of 4th toe phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the fourth toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of 5th toe phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the fifth toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of hallux phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the big toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd toe is that An elevation in bone density in the proximal phalanx of the second toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd toe is that An elevation in bone density in the proximal phalanx of the third toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd toe is that An elevation in bone density in the middle phalanx of the third toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd toe is that An elevation in bone density in the distal phalanx of the third toe. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of proximal toe phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more proximal phalanges of the toes. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of middle toe phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more middle phalanges of the toes. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.

The definition of the Sclerosis of distal toe phalanx is that An elevation in bone density in one or more distal phalanges of the toes. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
The definition of the Enlarged sylvian cistern is that An increase in size of the subarachnoid space associated with the lateral cerebral sulcus (Sylvian fissure).
The definition of the Open operculum is that Underdevelopment of the operculum.
The definition of the Abnormality of the renal medulla is that Any structural abnormality of the medulla of the kidney.

The definition of the Narrow foramen obturatorium is that Decreased width of the foramen obturatorium. The foramen obturatorium (also known as the obturator foramen) is a hole located between the ischium and pubis bones of the pelvis.

The definition of the Dense metaphyseal bands is that Dense radiopaque bands of bone which are thicker than the adjacent diaphyseal cortex and may form at the metaphysis of growing bones. They appear on radiographs as bone that is more radiopaque that the adjacent diaphyseal cortex.
The definition of the Enlarged hippocampus is that Increase in size of the hippocampus.
The definition of the Dysharmonic bone age is that Different levels of maturation of different bones.

The definition of the Dysharmonic accelerated bone age is that A type of dysharmonic skeletal maturation in which there is an acceleration in skeletal maturation whose degree differs markedly in different bones.
The definition of the Splayed epiphyses is that Flaring (widening) of the epiphysis.
The definition of the Abnormal shape of the palpebral fissure is that The presence of an abnormal shape of the palpebral fissure.
The definition of the Abnormal size of the palpebral fissures is that An abnormal size of the palpebral fissures for example unusually long or short palpebral fissures.
The definition of the Intestinal polyposis is that The presence of multiple polyps in the intestine.
The definition of the Neoplasm of fatty tissue is that A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of adipose tissue.
The definition of the Acrokeratosis is that Overgrowth of the stratum corneum characterized by flesh-coloured or slightly pigmented smooth or warty papules on the upper surface of hands and feet.
The definition of the Cerebral white matter agenesis is that Congenital defect with failure of the development of the cerebral white matter.

The definition of the Protanomaly is that A type of anomalous trichromacy associated with defective long-wavelength-sensitive (L) cones, causing the sensitivity spectrum to be shifted toward medium wavelengths. This leads to difficulties especially in distinguishing red and green.
The definition of the Corneal erosion is that An erosion or abrasion of the cornea's outermost layer of epithelial cells.
The definition of the Down-sloping shoulders is that Low set, steeply sloping shoulders.
The definition of the Choroid plexus papilloma is that Choroid plexus papilloma is a histologically benign neoplasm located in the ventricular system of the choroid plexus.

The definition of the Priapism is that A painful and harmful medical condition in which the erect penis doesn't return to its flaccid state, despite the absence of both physical and psychological stimulation, within four hours.
The definition of the Premature chromatid separation is that The presence of premature sister chromatid segregation.
The definition of the Pretibial myxedema is that A diffuse, non-pitting edema and thickening of the skin usually on the anterior aspect of the lower legs spreading to the dorsum of the feet.
The definition of the Vasculitis in the skin is that A type of vasculitis (inflammation of blood vessel walls) that affects skeletal muscle tissue. []
The definition of the Kayser-Fleischer ring is that Grey-green or brownish-pigmented ring in the deep epithelial layers at the outer border of the cornea.
The definition of the Papule is that A circumscribed, solid elevation of skin with no visible fluid, varying in size from a pinhead to less than 10mm in diameter at the widest point.
The definition of the Skin plaque is that A plaque is a solid, raised, plateau-like (flat-topped) lesion greater than 1 cm in diameter.
The definition of the Skin nodule is that Morphologically similar to a papule, but greater than either 10mm in both width and depth, and most frequently centered in the dermis or subcutaneous fat.
The definition of the skin vesicle is that A circumscribed, fluid-containing, epidermal elevation generally considered less than 10mm in diameter at the widest point.
The definition of the Pustule is that A small elevation of the skin containing cloudy or purulent material usually consisting of necrotic inflammatory cells.

The definition of the Epidermoid cyst is that Nontender, round and firm, but slightly compressible, intradermal or subcutaneous cyst measuring 0.5-5 cm in diameter. Epidermal cysts are intradermal or subcutaneous tumors, grow slowly and occur on the face, neck, back and scrotum. They usually appear at or around puberty, and as a rule an affected individual has one solitary or a few cysts.
The definition of the Skin erosion is that A discontinuity of the skin exhibiting incomplete loss of the epidermis, a lesion that is moist, circumscribed, and usually depressed.
The definition of the Skin ulcer is that A discontinuity of the skin exhibiting complete loss of the epidermis and often portions of the dermis and even subcutaneous fat.

The definition of the Verrucae is that Warts, benign growths on the skin or mucous membranes that cause cosmetic problems as well as pain and discomfort. Warts most often occur on the hands, feet, and genital areas.

The definition of the Porokeratosis is that A clonal disorder of keratinization with one or multiple atrophic patches surrounded by a clinically and histologically distinctive hyperkeratotic ridgelike border called the cornoid lamella.
The definition of the Cat cry is that The presence of a characteristic high-pitched cry that sounds similar to the meowing of a kitten.
The definition of the Chondritis of pinna is that Inflammation of the cartilage of the external ear.
The definition of the Hemihypotrophy of lower limb is that Shortening of a leg affecting only one side.
The definition of the Small hand is that Disproportionately small hand.
The definition of the Macular scarring is that Scar tissue in the macula.

The definition of the Marcus Gunn pupil is that An aberrant pupillary response characterized by (i) Constriction of pupils of both eyes when the light stimulus is applied to the normal eye, and (ii) Dilatation of pupils of both eyes when the light stimulus is rapidly transferred from the normal eye (after brief light exposure to the normal eye) to the affected eye. [PMID:23520419, PMID:32491607]
The definition of the Asymmetry of iris pigmentation is that Asymmetry between the two irides or asymmetry between different parts of one iris.

The definition of the Recurrent spontaneous abortion is that Repeated episodes of abortion (Expulsion of the product of fertilization before completing the term of gestation) without deliberate interference.
The definition of the Peripheral vitreoretinal degeneration is that A type of vitreoretinal degeneration with manifestations that are concentrated at the periphery of the retina. []
The definition of the Episodic quadriplegia is that Intermittent episodes of paralysis of all four limbs.

The definition of the Triangular-shaped open mouth is that A facial appearance characterized by a permanently or nearly permanently opened mouth, in which the upper lip is tented in a way that the opened mouth has the appearance of a triangle.
The definition of the Absent skin pigmentation is that Lack of skin pigmentation (coloring).
The definition of the Absent fifth fingernail is that Absence of nail of little finger.

The definition of the Recurrent upper and lower respiratory tract infections is that Increased susceptibility to upper and lower respiratory tract infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of upper and lower respiratory tract infections. []

The definition of the Atrial cardiomyopathy is that Any complex of structural, architectural, contractile or electrophysiological changes affecting the atria with the potential to produce clinically relevant manifestations. [PMID:27402624]
The definition of the Biventricular hypertrophy is that Thickening of the heart walls in both ventricles. [PMID:28740584]

The definition of the Cystic medial necrosis of the aorta is that An increase of medial mucoid extracellular matrix creating translamellar and/or intralamellar expansions including extracellular pools as noted on an H&E stain and/or a stain to highlight extracellular matrix material (Movat's pentachrome, Alcian blue, etc.). [PMID:27031798]
The definition of the Neuronal loss in basal ganglia is that A reduction in the number of nerve cells in the basal ganglia.
The definition of the CSF lymphocytic pleocytosis is that An increased lymphocyte count in the cerebrospinal fluid. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:KI_phemming]
The definition of the Tall chin is that Increased vertical distance from the vermillion border of the lower lip to the inferior-most point of the chin. [eom:96d8ca16a3c80216, PMID:19125436]

The definition of the Chin with vertical crease is that Vertical crease fold situated below the vermilion border of the lower lip and above the fatty pad of the chin with the face at rest. [eom:8a5493c72e0dd13c, PMID:19125436]
The definition of the Extra concha fold is that Folds or ridges within the concha that are distinct from the crus helix. [eom:40563f1f62db2319, PMID:19152421]

The definition of the Focal absence of the external ear is that Absence of a localized portion of the ear that cannot be described by a more precise term (e.g., absent ear lobe). [eom:5b0e213b31288acd, PMID:19152421]

The definition of the Long ear is that Median longitudinal ear length greater than two SD above the mean determined by the maximal distance from the superior aspect to the inferior aspect of the external ear. [eom:2028381d5c61842a, PMID:19152421]
The definition of the Polymenorrhea is that Frequent menses; menstrual cycles lasting less than 21 days. [PMID:22594864]
The definition of the Menometrorrhagia is that Prolonged/excessive menses and bleeding at irregular intervals. [PMID:22594864]
The definition of the Abnormality of ophthalmic artery is that Abnormality of the first branch of the internal carotid artery.

The definition of the Abnormality of the peripheral nervous system is that Any abnormality of the part of the nervous system that consists of the nerves and ganglia outside of the brain and spinal cord.

The definition of the Abnormality of the somatic nervous system is that Any abnormality of the part of the peripheral nervous system associated with sensation and skeletal muscle voluntary control of body movements.
The definition of the Abnormality of somatic nerve plexus is that Any abnormality of the somatic nerve plexus.
The definition of the Abnormality of masticatory muscle is that Any abnormality of the masticatory muscle.
The definition of the Abnormality of the mouth floor is that Any abnormality of the mouth floor.

The definition of the Abnormality of the submandibular region is that Any abnormality of the submandibular region, the region between the mandible and the hyoid bone contains the submandibular and sublingual glands, suprahyoid muscles, submandibular ganglion, and lingual artery.
The definition of the Abnormality of ganglion is that An abnormality of nerve cell cluster or a group of nerve cell bodies located in the autonomic nervous system.

The definition of the Abnormality of ganglion of peripheral nervous system is that An abnormality of nerve cell cluster or a group of nerve cell bodies located in the peripheral autonomic nervous system.
The definition of the Abnormality of cranial ganglion is that An abnormality of nerve cell cluster or a group of nerve cell bodies located in the autonomic nervous system of the cranium.
The definition of the Otitis externa is that Inflammation or infection of the external auditory canal (EAC), the auricle, or both.
The definition of the Recurrent ear infections is that Increased susceptibility to ear infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of ear infections.

The definition of the Abnormal distribution of cell junction proteins in buccal mucosal cells is that An anomalous amount or location of cell junction proteins such as plakoglobin or Cx43. [PMID:26850880]
The definition of the Abnormality of the periodontium is that Any abnormality of the periodontium. []
The definition of the Alveolar bone loss around teeth is that A decrease in the amount of alveolar bone around the root of a tooth. []
The definition of the Oral herpes is that Recurrent episodes of oral herpes, typically characterized by blisters or ulcers on the gums, lips and/or tongue caused by herpes virus. []
The definition of the Cleft lip is that A gap in the lip or lips. []

The definition of the Submucous cleft of soft and hard palate is that Soft and hard-palate submucous clefts are characterized by bony defects in the midline of the soft and hard palate that are covered by the lining (ie mucous membrane) of the roof of the mouth.
The definition of the Unilateral alveolar cleft of maxilla is that One sided alveolar cleft of the maxilla. []
The definition of the Bilateral alveolar cleft of maxilla is that Nonmidline alveolar cleft of the maxilla. []

The definition of the Abnormal T cell activation is that Any abnormality in the activation of T cells, i.e. the change in morphology and behavior of a mature or immature T cell resulting from exposure to a mitogen, cytokine, chemokine, cellular ligand, or an antigen for which it is specific. []

The definition of the Abnormal liver morphology is that Any structural anomaly of the bile-secreting organ that is important for detoxification, for fat, carbohydrate, and protein metabolism, and for glycogen storage. [MP:0000598]

The definition of the Abnormal neural tube morphology is that Any structural anomaly of the hollow epithelial tube found on the dorsal side of the vertebrate embryo that develops into the central nervous system (i.e. brain and spinal cord). [MP:0002151]

The definition of the Decreased level of 1,5 anhydroglucitol in serum is that A decrease in the level of 1,5 anhydroglucitol in the serum. 1,5-Anhydrosorbitol is a validated marker of short-term glycemic control. This substance is derived mainly from food, is well absorbed in the intestine, and is distributed to all organs and tissues. [PMID:16731998, PMID:17659063, PMID:9357814]

The definition of the Increased level of 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaric acid in urine is that The concentration of 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaric acid in the urine, normalized for urine concentration, is above the upper limit of normal. [PMID:15505778, PMID:23705938]
The definition of the Increased level of allantoin in serum is that An increase in the level of allantoin in the serum. [PMID:18636793]
The definition of the Increased level of GABA in serum is that An increase in the level of Gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA) in the blood circulation. [PMID:1485027, PMID:25485164]
The definition of the Decreased level of GABA in serum is that A decrease in the level of GABA in the serum. [PMID:1485027]
The definition of the Decreased level of erythritol in urine is that A decrease in the level of erythritol in the urine. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Decreased level of erythritol in CSF is that Concentration of erythritol in the cerebrospinal fluid below the lower limit of normal. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Increased level of D-threitol in plasma is that An increase in the level of D-threitol in the plasma. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Increased level of D-threitol in CSF is that An increase in the level of D-threitol in the cerebrospinal fluid. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Increased level of D-threitol in urine is that An increase in the level of D-threitol in the urine. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Decreased level of D-mannose in urine is that A decrease in the level of D-mannose in the urine. [PMID:2576290, PMID:29099052]
The definition of the Increased level of galactitol in plasma is that An increase in the level of galactitol in the plasma. [PMID:11092512, PMID:7671965]
The definition of the Increased level of galactitol in urine is that An increase in the level of galactitol in the urine. [PMID:11092512, PMID:7671965]
The definition of the Increased level of galactonate in red blood cells is that An increase in the level of galactonate in the red blood cells. [PMID:14680973]
The definition of the Increased level of galactitol in red blood cells is that An increase in the level of galactitol in the red blood cells. [PMID:14680973]
The definition of the Increased level of hippuric acid in blood is that An increase in the level of hippuric acid in the blood. [PMID:22626821]
The definition of the Increased level of hippuric acid in urine is that An increase in the level of hippuric acid in the urine. [PMID:19551947, PMID:22626821]
The definition of the Increased level of L-fucose in urine is that An increase in the level of L-fucose in the urine. [PMID:2311216]
The definition of the Increased level of propylene glycol in blood is that An increase in the level of propylene glycol in the blood. [PMID:3426740]

The definition of the Increased level of ribitol in urine is that An increase in the level of ribitol in the urine. Ribotol is a crystalline pentose alcohol (C5H12O5) and is a metabolic end product formed by the reduction of ribose. [PMID:14988808, PMID:26054712]
The definition of the Increased level of ribitol in CSF is that An increase in the level of ribitol in the cerebral spinal fluid. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Increased level of ribose in urine is that An increase in the level of ribose in the urine. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Increased level of ribose in CSF is that An increase in the level of ribose in the cerebrospinal fluid. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Increased level of xylitol in urine is that An increase in the level of xylitol in the urine. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Increased level of xylitol in CSF is that An increase in the level of xylitol in the cerebrospinal fluid. [PMID:14988808]
The definition of the Increased level of L-pyroglutamic acid in urine is that An increase in the level of L-pyroglutamic acid in the urine. [PMID:10094443, PMID:4557757]
The definition of the Chronic idiopathic urticaria is that Urticaria characterized by spontaneously recurring hives for 6 weeks or longer. [PMID:25807072]
The definition of the Physical urticaria is that Urticaria caused by physical agents, such as heat, cold, light, friction. [PMID:11702618]
The definition of the Cold urticaria is that Urticaria may be caused by cold temperatures. [PMID:11702618]

The definition of the Aquagenic urticaria is that A form of physical urticaria, in which contact with water, regardless of its temperature and source, evokes pruritic follicular wheals on the skin. [PMID:22346281]
The definition of the Solar urticaria is that Urticaria in response to exposure to ultraviolet-A (UVA), ultraviolet-B (UVB), visible and rarely infrared light. [PMID:29315482]
The definition of the Vibratory urticaria is that Urticaria in response to dermal vibration, with coincident degranulation of mast cells and increased histamine levels in serum. [PMID:26841242]
The definition of the Exercise induced anaphylaxis is that Anaphylaxis after physical activity. [PMID:7400473]

The definition of the Ectopic cilia of eyelid is that An eyelash that emerges from the underside (conjunctiva) of the upper or lower eyelid. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:GOC_MG, http://www.eyecareforanimals.com/animal-eye-conditions/general/251-distichiasis-trichiasis-ectopic-cilia.html]

The definition of the Symblepharon is that A partial or complete adhesion of the palpebral conjunctiva of the eyelid to the bulbar conjunctiva of the eyeball. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:GOC_MG, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Symblepharon]
The definition of the Accessory eyelid is that The presence of more than the normal number of eyelids. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:GOC_MG]
The definition of the Hypoplasia of eyelid is that Developmental hypoplasia of the eyelid. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:GOC_MG]
The definition of the Microblepharia is that Abnormal shortness of the vertical dimensions of the eyelids.
The definition of the Defect of palpebral conjunctiva is that An abnormality of the palpebral conjunctiva. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:GOC_MG]
The definition of the Abnormality of musculature of soft palate is that An abnormality of one or more of the five muscles of the soft palate.
The definition of the Abnormality of musculature of pharynx is that An abnormality of any of the muscles of the pharynx.
The definition of the Abnormality of tensor veli palatini muscle is that An abnormality of the tensor veli palatini muscle
The definition of the Abnormality of uvular muscle is that An abnormality of the uvular muscle
The definition of the Abnormality of nasal musculature is that An abnormality of the muscles of the structure of the nose.

The definition of the Abnormality of muscle of facial expression is that An abnormality of any of the muscles of facial expression, which are innervated by the seventh (VII) cranial nerve and control facial expression.
The definition of the Abnormality of levator labii superioris alaeque nasi muscle is that An abnormality of the levator labii superioris alaeque nasi muscle.

The definition of the Abnormality of the common carotid artery is that An abnormality of the common carotid arteries, which provide the arterial supply to the head and neck and give rise to the internal carotid artery and the external carotid artery.
The definition of the Abnormality of external jugular vein is that An abnormality of an external jugular vein of the neck.
The definition of the Bilateral facial palsy is that Two-sided or bilateral weakness of the muscles of facial expression and eye closure.
The definition of the Urethritis is that Inflammation of the urethra. [PMID:26220178]

The definition of the Iris flocculi is that Multiple cysts along the pupillary margin that appear as spherical or tear-drop-shaped pigmented lesions or wrinkled masses emerging from the pupillary border of the iris. [PMID:27843899, PMID:7575269]
The definition of the Cornea verticillata is that Golden brown or gray deposits with a clockwise, whorl-like distribution in the inferior interpalpebal portion of the cornea.

The definition of the Dysplastic gangliocytoma of the cerebellum is that It is a rare, slowly growing tumor of the cerebellum, a gangliocytoma sometimes considered to be a hamartoma, characterized by diffuse hypertrophy of the granular layer of the cerebellum. [PMID:11073535]
The definition of the Moon facies is that A rounded, puffy face with fat deposits in the temporal fossa and cheeks, a double chin.

The definition of the Abnormality of gonadotropin-releasing hormone level is that A deviation from the normal circulating concentration of the normal gonadotropin-releasing hormone (GnRH). Intermittent GnRH secretion from the hypothalamus acts upon its receptor in the anterior pituitary to regulate the production and release of the gonadotropins, follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH) and luteinizing hormone (LH).
The definition of the Lack of gonadotropin-releasing hormone pulsatility is that Secretion of gonadotropin-releasing hormone that does not occur in a pulsatile fashion.
The definition of the Reduced brain gamma-aminobutyric acid level by MRS is that An decreased level of gamma-aminobutyric acid in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).
The definition of the Abnormal serum dehydroepiandrosterone level is that A deviation from the normal concentration of dehydroepiandrosterone in the circulation. [PMID:27979632]
The definition of the Shoulder muscle aplasia is that Absence of shoulder muscles. []
The definition of the Aplasia of the musculature of the pelvis is that Absence of the musculature of the pelvis. []
The definition of the Hypoplasia of the musculature of the pelvis is that Underdevelopment of the musculature of the pelvis. []
The definition of the Aplastic colon is that Congenital absence of the colon []
The definition of the Cotton wool plaques is that Deposition of large, diffuse cotton wool amyloid plaques (CWPs) lacking a dense core and associated neuritic changes. [PMID:20460383]
The definition of the Abnormal hepatic glycogen storage is that Change in normal glycogen storage content. [PMID:26835382]
The definition of the Sclerosis of the carpal bones is that An elevation in bone density in one or more carpal bones of the hand. [PMID:21120491]
The definition of the Abnormal neuron branching is that Abnormality of the structure and branching of the dendrites of a neuron. [PMID:20404840]
The definition of the Abnormal natural killer subset distribution is that Any abnormality in the proportion natural killer subsets relative to the total number of natural killer cells. []
The definition of the Nasolacrimal sac obstruction is that Blockage of the nasolacrimal sac. [PMID:17203310]

The definition of the Nasolacrimal sac granuloma is that A mass of granulation tissue in response to chronic dacryocystitis as polypoid formations or they follow accidental injury, from probing and as a reaction to retained foreign bodies in the sac. [PMID:13434546]
The definition of the Nasolacrimal sac papilloma is that Benign tumor of the nasolacrimal sac. [PMID:4352147]
The definition of the Nasolacrimal sac epithelial papillary carcinoma is that The malignant epithelial neoplasm with papillary growths in the nasolacrimal sac. [PMID:16253035]
The definition of the Conjunctival cicatrization is that An abnormality of the conjuctiva and ocular surface caused by conjunctival inflammation and associated with scarring.
The definition of the Dermolipoma of the conjunctiva is that A benign tumor composed of adipose tissue and dense connective tissue usually located near the temporal fornix. [PMID:25586714]
The definition of the Myopic astigmatism is that A condition where one or both of the two principal meridians focus in the front of the retina when the eye is at rest.
The definition of the Latent hypermetropia is that A term to describe when farsightedness is masked when the accommodative muscles are used to increase the focusing power of the eye. []
The definition of the Eyelid retraction is that With the eyes in primary position, the sclera is visible above the superior corneal limbus.
The definition of the Upper eyelid retraction is that An elevation of the eyelid above the normal level in the primary position. [PMID:7735674]
The definition of the Collier's sign is that A unilateral or bilateral eyelid retraction due to midbrain lesions. [PMID:17323781]
The definition of the Seborrhoeic blepharitis is that Inflammation of the eyelid due to overactivity of the sebaceous gland. [PMID:10777824]
The definition of the Nasolacrimal sac lymphoma is that A type of lymphoma that involves the nasolacrimal sac.

The definition of the Delayed canalization of nasolacrimal duct is that A very common condition in which the extreme end of the nasolacrimal duct underneath the inferior turbinate fails to complete its canalization in the newborn period. [PMID:11222337]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity is that An avascular or abnormally vascularized retina that occurs in premature infants and can lead to blindness. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9, PMID:16009843]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 1 is that The retinal vessels stop and then a linear flat white line is present that usually runs the circumference of the vascular retina. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9, PMID:16009843]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 2 is that The accumulating neovascularization thickens and manifests as a linear bump. The neovascularization remains along the surface of the retina and does not extend off the retina into the cortical vitreous. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 3 is that The neovascularization accumulates at the edge of the vascularized retina and extends into the vitreous (also called extra retinal fibrosis proliferation). In cases of Zone 2 and Zone 3, this may be sausage shaped. In more posterior Zone 1 disease, the stage 3 can appear as a direct extension of the normal retinal vessels but extending tangentially over the avascular retina. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4 is that Scar tissue that forms a continuous sheet coming up from the edge of the vascularized retina. This scar tissue can grow toward the vitreous base/posterior lens capsule resulting in traction, distortion, and even detachment. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]
The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4a is that A detachment that involves the peripheral retina that does not extend into the macula. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4b is that A detachment that involves the peripheral retina that involves the macula itself. The detachment usually starts in the temporal periphery although can also involve the nasal retina as well. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]
The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5 is that Funnel detachment from the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]
The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5a is that An open funnel detachment of the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]
The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5b is that A closed funnel detachment of the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity zone I is that Retinopathy which extends from the center of the optic disc to twice the distance from the center of the optic disc to the center of the macula. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9, PMID:16009843]
The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity zone II is that Retinopathy which extends centrifugally from the edge of zone I to the nasal ora serrata. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9, PMID:16009843]
The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity zone III is that Retinopathy which is a residual crescent of retina anterior to zone II. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9, PMID:16009843]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity plus is that Venous dilatation and arteriolar tortuosity of the posterior retinal vessels and may later increase in severity to include iris vascular engorgement, poor pupillary dilatation (rigid pupil), and vitreous haze. This definition has been further refined in the later clinical trials in which the diagnosis of plus disease could be made if sufficient vascular dilatation and tortuosity are present in at least 2 quadrants of the eye. [PMID:16009843]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity pre-plus is that As vascular abnormalities of the posterior pole that are insufficient for the diagnosis of plus disease but that demonstrate more arterial tortuosity and more venous dilatation than normal. [PMID:16009843]

The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity threshold is that A retinopathy with a 50% likelihood of progressing to retinal detachment. Threshold disease is considered to be present when stage 3 retinopathy of prematurity (ROP) is present in either zone I or zone II, with at least 5 continuous or 8 total clock hours of disease, and the presence of plus disease. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]
The definition of the Retinopathy of prematurity prethreshold is that High risk patients who were in Zone 1 (no Plus or stage 3) or Zone 2 with Plus or stage 3 but not both. [ISBN:978-3-319-52190-9]
The definition of the Latent myopia is that The difference between total and manifest myopia.
The definition of the Paralytic ectropion is that A type of ectropion associated with orbicularis muscle weakness caused by cranial nerve VII palsy.

The definition of the Conjunctival dermolipoma is that A conjuctival lesion composed of adipose tissue and dense connective tissue. Such choristomas of dermal elements are normally found at the outer canthus, and have a gelatinous appearance. Classically, there is an indistinct posterior border (with the lesion frequently extending into the orbit) and a well-demarcated anterior border several millimetres posterior to the limbus.
The definition of the Absolute eccentric fixation is that Eccentric fixation in which the angle of eccentricity equals the objective angle of deviation.
The definition of the Abnormal ocular alignment is that Any deviation from the normal ocular alignment.
The definition of the Dissociated vertical deviation is that An incomitant tendency for an occluded eye to elevate and extort which resolves on uncovering. [ISBN-13:978-0199679980]

The definition of the Dissociated horizontal deviation is that A change in horizontal ocular alignment, unrelated to accommodation, that is brought about solely by a change in the balance of visual input from the two eyes. [PMID:18427617]
The definition of the Alternating hypetropia is that A type of vertical tropia in which, when one eye is fixing, the other eye is deviated upwards.
The definition of the Alternating hyperphoria is that A type of vertical phoria in which, in dissociation, the occluded eye deviates upwards.
The definition of the Alternating hypotropia is that A type of vertical tropia in which, when one eye is fixing, the other eye is deviated downwards.
The definition of the Alternating hypophoria is that A type of vertical phoria in which, in dissociation, the occluded eye deviates downwards.

The definition of the Pseudophakia is that The term pseudophakia refers to having an artificial lens implanted after the natural eye lens has been removed. During cataract surgery the natural cloudy lens is replaced by an pseudophakia intraocular lens (IOL). [PMID:28358301]

The definition of the Proximal scleroderma is that Symmetrical thickening, tightening and induration of the skin of the fingers and the skin proximal to the metacarpophalangeal or metatarsophalangeal joints. These changes can involve the entire limb, face, neck and trunk. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:RGD_gthayman, PMID:3954464]

The definition of the Verruca plana is that Slightly raised wart 2-5 mm in diameter often associated with viral infections, commonly persistent in immunodeficient individuals. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:ucbasharo]

The definition of the Bilateral basilar pulmonary fibrosis is that It is a bilateral reticular pattern of linear or lineonodular densities that are most pronounced in basilar portions of the lungs on standard chest x-ray. It is the third minor criterion for scleroderma diagnosis. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR:RGD_gthayman, PMID:7378088]
The definition of the Abnormal inner ear epithelium morphology is that Any structural anomaly of an inner ear epithelium. []
The definition of the Abnormality of frontalis muscle belly is that An abnormality of a frontalis muscle belly. []
The definition of the Abnormality of masseter muscle is that An abnormality of a masseter muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of medial pterygoid muscle is that An abnormality of a medial pterygoid muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of mentalis muscle is that An abnormality of a mentalis muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of mylohyoid muscle is that An abnormality of a mylohyoid muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of nasalis muscle is that An abnormality of a nasalis muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of orbicularis oris muscle is that An abnormality of an orbicularis oris muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of palatoglossus muscle is that An abnormality of a palatoglossus muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of palatopharyngeus muscle is that An abnormality of a palatopharyngeus muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of platysma is that An abnormality of the platysma muscle.
The definition of the Abnormality of procerus muscle is that An abnormality of a procerus. []
The definition of the Abnormality of risorius muscle is that An abnormality of a risorius muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of styloglossus muscle is that An abnormality of the styloglossus muscle.
The definition of the Abnormality of temporalis muscle is that An abnormality of a temporalis muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of zygomaticus major muscle is that An abnormality of a zygomaticus major muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of buccal mucosa is that An abnormality of a buccal mucosa. []
The definition of the Abnormality of zygomaticus minor muscle is that An abnormality of a zygomaticus minor muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of buccal fat pad is that An abnormality of a buccal fat pad. []
The definition of the Abnormality of angular artery is that An abnormality of the angular artery, the terminal branch of the facial artery.
The definition of the Abnormality of facial artery is that Any structural abnormality of a facial artery, one of the branches of the external carotid artery.
The definition of the Abnormality of ciliary ganglion is that An abnormality of a ciliary ganglion. []
The definition of the Abnormality of buccinator muscle is that An abnormality of a buccinator muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of depressor anguli oris muscle is that An abnormality of a depressor anguli oris muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of depressor labii inferioris is that An abnormality of a depressor labii inferioris. []
The definition of the Abnormality of anterior ethmoidal artery is that An abnormality of an anterior ethmoidal artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of central retinal artery is that An abnormality of a central retinal artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of nasopharyngeal adenoids is that Any abnormality of nasopharyngeal adenoids. []

The definition of the Abnormality of cervical plexus is that Abnormality of the plexus of the ventral rami of the first four cervical spinal nerves which are located from C1 to C4 cervical segment in the neck.
The definition of the Abnormality of head blood vessel is that An abnormality of a blood vessel of the head, including branches of the arterial and venous systems of the head.
