The definition of the Abnormality of neck blood vessel is that An abnormality of a blood vessel of the neck, including branches of the arterial and venous systems of the neck.
The definition of the Abnormality of dorsal nasal artery is that An abnormality of a dorsal nasal artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of ethmoid sinus is that An abnormality of an ethmoid sinus. []
The definition of the Abnormality of external carotid artery is that An abnormality of an external carotid artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of jugular vein is that Any structural abnormality of a jugular vein. []
The definition of the Abnormality of facial vein is that An abnormality of a facial vein. []
The definition of the Abnormality of frontal process of maxilla is that An abnormality of a frontal process of the maxilla bone.
The definition of the Abnormality of genioglossus muscle is that An abnormality of a genioglossus muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of geniohyoid muscle is that An abnormality of a geniohyoid muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of glossopharyngeal nerve is that Any structural anomaly of the glossopharyngeal nerve, the ninth paired cranial nerve (CN IX). []
The definition of the Abnormality of great auricular nerve is that Any structural anomaly of a great auricular nerve. [PMID:26504711]
The definition of the Abnormality of greater palatine artery is that An abnormality of a greater palatine artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of odontoid tissue is that An abnormality of an odontoid tissue. []
The definition of the Abnormality of hyoglossus muscle is that An abnormality of a hyoglossus muscle. []

The definition of the Abnormality of hyoid bone is that Any structural abnormality of the hyoid bone (hyoid), a small U-shaped (horseshoe-shaped) solitary bone, situated in the midline of the neck anteriorly at the base of the mandible and posteriorly at the fourth cervical vertebra. [PMID:30969548]

The definition of the Abnormality of hypopharynx is that A structural anomaly of the hypopharyx, which is the most inferior portion of the pharynx. The hypopharynx continues from the oropharynx at the pharyngoepiglottic fold superiorly and extends inferiorly to the level of the inferior aspect of the cricoid cartilage, which marks the beginning of the cervical esophagus.
The definition of the Abnormality of inferior alveolar artery is that An abnormality of an inferior alveolar artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of inferior alveolar nerve is that An abnormality of an inferior alveolar nerve. []
The definition of the Abnormality of artery of lower lip is that An abnormality of an artery of lower lip. []
The definition of the Abnormality of inferior oblique extraocular muscle is that An abnormality of an inferior oblique extraocular muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of inferior rectus extraocular muscle is that An abnormality of an inferior rectus extraocular muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of inferior thyroid vein is that An abnormality of an inferior thyroid vein. []
The definition of the Abnormality of infraorbital artery is that An abnormality of an infraorbital artery. []

The definition of the Abnormality of infra-orbital nerve is that A structural abnormality of an infra-orbital nerve. The infraorbital nerve arises from the maxillary branch of the trigeminal nerve and normally traverses the orbital floor in the infraorbital canal. [PMID:26564432]
The definition of the Abnormality of internal carotid artery is that An abnormality of an internal carotid artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of internal jugular vein is that An abnormality of an internal jugular vein. []
The definition of the Abnormality of intrinsic muscle of tongue is that An abnormality of an intrinsic muscle of tongue. []
The definition of the Abnormality of lacrimal artery is that An abnormality of a lacrimal artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of lacrimal sac is that An abnormality of a lacrimal sac. []

The definition of the Abnormality of lateral crico-arytenoid is that Any structural abnormality of a lateral crico-arytenoid muscle, which extends from the lateral cricoid cartilage to the muscular process of the arytenoid cartilage, and can adduct the vocal cords, which closes the rima glottidis and thereby protects the airway. []
The definition of the Abnormality of lateral pterygoid muscle is that An abnormality of a lateral pterygoid muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of lateral rectus extra-ocular muscle is that An abnormality of a lateral rectus extra-ocular muscle. []
The definition of the Abnormality of levator anguli oris is that An abnormality of a levator anguli oris. []
The definition of the Abnormality of levator labii superioris is that An abnormality of a levator labii superioris. []
The definition of the Abnormality of levator palpebrae superioris is that An abnormality of a levator palpebrae superioris. []
The definition of the Abnormality of levator veli palatini muscle is that An abnormality of a levator veli palatini. []
The definition of the Abnormality of lingual artery is that Any structural abnormality of a lingual artery. []
The definition of the Abnormality of lingual nerve is that Any structural anomaly of a lingual nerve. [PMID:27662622]
The definition of the Abnormality of lingual tonsil is that An abnormality of a lingual tonsil. []
The definition of the Abnormality of mandible condylar process is that An abnormality of a mandible condylar process. []
The definition of the Abnormality of mandible coronoid process is that An abnormality of a mandible coronoid process. []
The definition of the Abnormality of mandibular symphysis is that A structural abnormality of a mandibular symphysis. []
